name: 4th Love Heavenly Jeggings
description:
We just received these super stretchy jeggings in from NYC based 4th Love and are in love with them! They look like a jean but fit like a legging, made of super soft, enzyme washed french terry, You will live in them throughout your pregnancy.

Feature, front & back pocket, soft over belly french terry panel, ankle zippers, nice long leg that can be scrunched up too.

91% Cotton / 9% Spandex
Available in Black, Washed Denim (distressed look) and Olive
Wash Machine Cold with dark colors
Made in USA 

We'll have a full range of sizes & colors soon.

name: Sweet Mommy Down Maternity & Babywearing Coat
description:
We are thrilled to have a great new maternity and babywearing option arriving at Bump very soon (we hope before the end of the year). Both warm and incredibly chic, this coat will take you through pregnancy and then babywearing with the added panel.

Composition: 
Outside: Rayon 65% + Polyester 35%. Liner: 100% Polyester
Filling: goose down 90%, feather 10%.

Style # SJ2048

name: Mountain Mama Acadia Hooded Poncho
description:
Looking for a cozy poncho to wear during pregnancy and after (for easy nursing access, the Acadia Poncho from California based Mountain Mama is a great option. Made of super soft double layer fleece, this poncho will keep you and or your bump or your babe nice and warm.

Double-layer hood cut to shield from the sun and keep warmth in.  Hip-cut with an open bell shape-- all without adding extra weight.  Deep-V shawl collar front.  Roomy front pockets keep your belongings close.  Button-hole closures at hem to keep your hands free to move.  Mountain Mama developed the Acadia to keep growing bellies warm and cozy during pregnancy, but then transitions to a convenient and easy nursing cover-up that fights the chill.  Keeps you warm and ready to play!

100% Polyester Velour
Machine Wash Cold/Line Dry
Made in California

name: Mountain Mama Lassen Hooded Fleece Jacket in Black
description:
This is a perfect layering jacket for active mamas to be. Super cozy fleece will keep you warm and snug en route to yoga or running out to the shops. 

Combine an extra high neck, fitted hood, thumb-cuffs, and thigh length cut with the amazing 4-way stretch of Polartec® PowerStretch® fleece and you've got the perfect maternity jacket for fall in the mountains or winter in more temperate climes. Bellyglove fit goes from a sleek silhouette to belly flaunting without missing a beat. 

Bellyglove is Mountain Mama's unique curved-front maternity cut that eliminates up-drafts, unflattering draping, and peek-a-boo belly.

53%Poly/38%Nylon/9%Spandex
Machine wash cold, tumble dry low or line dry

Made in California

name: Dear Kate Amelia Hipster Full Lining
description:
Looking for a perfect panty with a little extra protection? Dear Kate is your answer. Like all Dear Kate underthings, The Amelia incorporates our revolutionary patent-pending fabric to keep you covered throughout the day. The Amelia with full lining provides a little extra protection when you might need it during pregnancy or after. 

The inner lining is black and stain-releasing, and the underwear is machine washable, so you'll never hand wash again. A leak-resistant outer layer protects against leaks of all kinds, while wicking fabric on the inside keeps you cool and comfortable.

FABRIC CONTENT Body: 76% Nylon, 24% Lycra. Lining: 100% Micropolyester. Lace Waistband: 81% Nylon, 19% Spandex. 

SPECIAL CARE RECOMMENDATIONS  Dear Kates provide protection against light leaks; if wearing as period underwear, please use in addition to your regular pad/tampon routine. Also ideal for light bladder issues. Just like other advanced technical fabrics, Dear Kates perform best when washed without the use of fabric softeners.

name: Virina Maternity Warm Cowl Neck Dress
description:
We just received in this fabulous winter dress from Japanese based Virina Maternity. It is classic, comfortable and easy and perfect post pregnancy as well. 

Made of a great heavy weight fabric, this is a perfect dress to wear throughout pregnancy from start to finish. Great for work with tights & heels or leggings & boots. 


Material: Tencel 73%, 23% Nylon, 4% Polyurethane 
Hand Wash, Dry Flat or Dry Clean

Made in JAPAN

name: The Dairy Fairy Arden All-In-One Naked Nursing Bra
description:
This great nursing & pumping bra from The Dairy Fairy has quickly become a Bump customer favorite and now available in a solid version with matching trim 

It is a brand new bra (came out spring 2013) designed for nursing & pumping mamas in mind (you can even nurse and pump at the same time). Featuring an adjustable band and two different access points, this is a versatile bra you will want to have on hand when you delivery your baby.

~Handsfree pumping using a layer that provides a tight fit for a breast shield
~Fold down nursing panel so baby can have easy and complete access to the breast
~Both sides are independent, to allow for simultaneous pumping and nursing
~Convenient and efficient – Wear this bra all day, with no need to disrobe and change into an alternate hands free pumping bra
~Innovative top cross over design to adjust the fit to your changing fullness level, create cleavage and remind you which breast was last used
~Adjustable back straps that can be crossed for a racerback option
~Sexy and appealing design, that complements a woman’s figure, with feminine touches of lace trim, and practical color options
~Superior fit and comfort with soft cotton spandex with just the right amount of stretch
~Compatible with all popular breast pump makes and models
~Patent pending

name: Ambit NYC CDC Tee Dress
description:
This is a fun silk dress from local Brooklyn line Ambit NYC. While not specifically for pregnancy, this dress will work for all 9 months and easily become a staple in your wardrobe long after your baby arrives. 

We love the simple design, two-tone colors that can be reversed front or back and how easily this dress can transition from season to season and day to night. 

One size fits most.
100% Silk
Made In NYC

name: Line Knitwear The Clarke Wrap Cardigan
description:
This is a Bump favorite cardigan every season from contemporary knitwear company Line. Super soft with a great fit, you will wear this cardigan throughout pregnancy and long after. 

Made of a finely knit modal-cashmere blend, this cardigan is sure to become a favorite. Perfect for draping during pregnancy and concealing your bump as well as wearing while nursing to cover baby. 

True to size though does fit a little slim through arms & shoulders.

85% Modal/15% Cashmere
Dry Clean Only

Baltic Blue Cardi is pictured with the Ambit Tunic Dress

name: Au Lait Nursing Tee Dress
description:
A bestseller thus far, we'll have more dresses in stock again soon!

Au Lait dubs this The Tee Dress because you can wear it as a long nursing top when paired with leggings or as a weekend dress all on its own.  The best part?  Nobody will ever guess that you are wearing a nursing dress!

The Tee Dress has also been tested by pregnant moms who are still breastfeeding, making it one of the best investments you can make in your mommy journey.  Heard enough about maternity clothes that are perfect for being, during, and after pregnancy?  This is the only dress that can truly keep that promise.  
 
Made in our medium-weight jersey, this fabric is stretchy enough to flatter your shape but also has recovery to provide control for your body.  Au Lait only has one mission and that is to help you looking for very best while you are completing your most scared mission for your baby.    
 
Specially designed front nursing panels provide discreet nursing and our yarn-dyed jersey will be gentle and smooth against your baby's cheeks.
 
Fits true to size and is a little fitted, so if you are unsure, we suggest going up a size.
 
92% Rayon 8%Spandex
Machine wash cold with like colors

name: Au Lait Seamless Lounge/Nursing Bra
description:
This is a great bra for pregnancy and nursing from brand new NYC based line Au Lait. 

The Seamless Lounge Nursing Bra is the ultimate comfy bra for the nursing mother. Knitted on special Italian circular machines so that there are no side seams, this bra offers medium support to be worn under nursing tops during the day, but is also truly comfortable enough to sleep in.  Designed especially with the breastfeeding mother in mind, the back of the bra also features a cross-over design in order accommodate the change in breast size throughout the day and night.  

Even the bottom band of this nursing bra was designed and constructed for maximum stretch and recovery without being too constricting for those nursing mothers who are prone to mastitis.  
 
Special pockets on the inside of the bra comes with removable cups for wearing during the day. The pockets also allow you to tuck washable nursing pads into so they will stay in place while you sleep.
 
Every detail of the Seamless Lounge Nursing Bra is designed to provide the most versatile use for the breastfeeding mother without sacrificing any comfort.
 
 
94% Nylon 6% Spandex
Machine Wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low.

name: Au Lait Nursing Tank
description:
We are pleased to have the brand new nursing line Au Lait - designed and produced here in NYC by a new mama.

The Tank from Au Lait keeps things modern and classy with a clean silhouette that will fit into any wardrobe. Whether you just had a baby or have been breastfeeding for a while, you can adjust how you wear this nursing top to your changing body.

The specially designed nursing tank veers away from traditional knits with a light-as-cloud Poly-Silk to offer a more stylish and polished look.  Don't shy away from this breathable fabric because our nursing tank is constructed with special nursing panels in the front that also accommodate the changing size of your bust throughout the day.  

Specially designed front panels provide discreet nursing and our washable Poly-Silk will be gentle and smooth against your baby's cheeks.

Fits true to size if not a little generous.

name: Miel Nana Bra
description:
We love this bra for pregnancy and nursing. It perfect for those of us in the B-DD cup range. The Nana bra from Canadian based Miel is not specifically a nursing bra but it provides easy pull down nursing access and is super comfortable during pregnancy when your other bras reach their less than comfortable stage. 

We aren't fans of wearing nursing bras during pregnancy (except for maybe the last month when you are closest to the size you will be when you start nursing) but this bra is a great option for comfort, support and shaping anytime.

The ideal everyday bra. The flattering Nana bra is supportive enough to go from work to the health club and even comfortable enough to sleep in. The unique under-bust panel and contour seams provide a supportive and defining fit without an under-wire. The fabric blend of elastane/spandex and microfiber is smooth, soft and stretchy. Super comfy to wear and easy to wash.


Product information:
The softest lightweight microfiber/ stretchy spandex blend.
Breathable fabric, wicks away moisture and dries quickly.
Combination seamless and flat seam construction that won't dig in or rise up.
Built-in anti-microbial protection against stains & odors to keep the fabric fresh and clean all day.

This bra has lots of stretch and support. If you are not sure of your size, we suggest going down a size as it runs a little generous.

options.name: Black M/L (34-36 B/C Cup - Fits most D's)
White M/L (34-36 B/C Cup - Fits most D's)
Coral M/L (34-36 B/C Cup - Fits most D's)
Grey M/L (34-36 B/C Cup - Fits most D's)

name: Fragile Cookie Cinched Waist Blouse
description:
This is a lovely blouse for during and after pregnancy from one of our favorite line's Fragile. 

Features drape collar, tie waist, full button down (perfect for nursing access), 3/4 length sleeve.

100% Viscose

Handwash, Iron Low or Dry Clean

Style # M51026-F4010

name: Fragile Bow Tie Bird Print Dress
description:
This is a tried and true style from Fragile and we love the bird print for fall. 

Side neck tie, fitted a-line shape, full length sleeve, hits just above the knee. This is a style you can wear well after your baby arrives.

95% Viscose/5% Elastane
Handwash or Dry Clean

Please note, we only have the red bird print available.


Style # M9839-F1430

name: Boba 4G Baby Carrier
description:
Our favorite baby carrier from Boba just got revamped and is better than ever! The integrated infant insert makes this carrier easy to use from a 7 pound newborn up to 45 pounds (your average 5 year old).

The Boba Carrier 4G includes more than a dozen features making this carrier truly one of a kind! Ideal for babies and toddlers alike, the Boba Carrier comes with an integrated infant insert and may be used well into toddlerhood. The carrier can be used from 7-45lbs. The ergonomic design, foot straps, and multiple adjustments make this carrier the perfect fit for your entire family. 

The Boba Carrier makes babywearing more convenient, comfortable, and ergonomically correct than ever before. It grows with your child, thanks to an integrated infant insert, detachable foot straps, and 10 other bonus features. Now parents and kids of all shapes and sizes can explore the world—together!

Specifications
Weight Range: 7-45lbs
Waist Belt: 25"-58"
Fits Adults: 5'0"-6'3"
Buckles Used: Duraflex
Zippers Used: YKK
Shoulder strap length: 20" to 40"
Fabric 100% cotton for the Classic Collection
Height of the body of the carrier: 15.7". Height of the waist belt: 5.1"
Width of the Seat of the Carrier: 13.5"
Weight of the carrier: 2lbs
Made in China

Style # BC4

name: Dote Dara Nursing Top
description:
This is a fun layering top from Dote Studio, one of our favorite nursing lines. Great for easy, fashionable nursing access. We love the drapey raglan sleeves, asymmetrical layers and stripe inlay.

Double layer front with slit nursing access in under layer.

100% modal (black knit) & 100% cotton (inner stripe knit) 

Machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle with like colours. 
Do not bleach, do not tumble dry or dry clean. 
Dry items inside out away from direct sunlight. 
Iron on low heat. Do not soak.
As an added precaution you may also place your garments inside a laundry net before washing.

name: Maternal America Cashmere Dress
description:
We could live in this cashmere dress from Maternal America. It is the perfect upgraded sweatshirt for cool weather. Cozy and comfortable with a great drape - you will be wearing this for a long time after your baby arrives.

100% Cashmere
Dry Clean

name: Slacks & Co Soho Under Bump Skinny Jean
description:
We love the fit of these easy under bump skinny jeans from UK based Slacks & Co. They have a great fit that will carry you through your pregnancy and transition with you once your baby arrives. Plenty of stretch, nice low front but plenty of bum coverage. Fit true to size.

Front fastening jean stud
Front metal zip fly
Elegant skinny leg
Elastic side panel inserts
Functional back jean pockets

Pants: 97% Cotton, 3% Elastane
Inserts: Elastic
Machine washable cool with like colors
Made in Europe

name: Maternal America Polka Dot Skinny Jeans
description:
These are a fresh and fun new jean from maternity favorite Maternal America. We are a huge fan of their fit and love the supportive over belly panel (which can easily be folded under belly as well). 

Jeans are ankle length, perfect for fall & winter boots and transitioning into spring with pumps or ballet flats.

98% Cotton/2% Spandex

Wash with like colors inside out. 
Please wash before wearing and note that some fading it to be expected. 

Style # PH305

name: Lilac Maternity Skinny Jean
description:
Lilac Maternity is known for their great fitting denim.

These jeans are not only cute, flattering and the most comfy things you’ll ever put on, they also have functions that most jeans don’t have. Each pair comes with an internal adjustable waistband which guarantees a perfect fit... no squeezing or gapping.

They also include a panel that doubles for maternity or modesty (fold it over if you want to hold in those love handles) and the softest stretchiest denim that won’t “stretch-out” after wearing all day.


• Cotton/Poly/Spandex
 • 29" inseam
 • Made in China
 • Machine Wash
 • Style #582

name: Lilac Maternity Signature Straight Leg Jean
description:
This is the perfect everyday jean with a great overbelly panel, nice pocket detail and a great fit.

Lilac’s number one seller is their DENIM. These jeans are not only cute, flattering and the most comfy things you’ll ever put on, they also have functions that most jeans don’t have. Each pair comes with an internal adjustable waistband which guarantees a perfect fit... no squeezing or gapping.

They also include a panel that doubles for maternity or modesty (fold it over if you want to hold in those love handles) and the softest stretchiest denim that won’t “stretch-out” after wearing all day.


• Cotton/Poly/Spandex
 • 33.5" inseam
 • Made in China
 • Machine Wash
 • Style #550

name: Lilac Maternity Denim Jacket
description:
Looking for the perfect little denim jacket for fall layering. The Lilac Denim jacket has just enough stretch to be able to close for most of your pregnancy and feel comfortable for all of it. This is a jacket you will continue to wear long after your baby arrives.

Cotton/Spandex Blend
Machine Wash
Style #564

name: Boob Fast Food Nursing Bra
description:
This is a perfect bra for nursing mothers looking for a smooth cup and decent support (up to about a DD cup).

Boob's Fast Food Nursing Bra is a soft, seamless bra with a perfect fit both during pregnancy and nursing. It is smart and flexible in a flattering, feminine design. The bra has a deep cut with a thin lace edging and wide adjustable straps with nickel-free details. The cups un-clip easily with one hand.

The enforced section under and around the breasts offers extra support. Flexibility in the bra accommodates changing breast size, common during nursing. The size can also be altered with an additional hook & eye ribbon, supplied with every bra. 

Soft, comfortable and fast-drying fabric in 92% polyamide and 8% elastane. 
Machine washable, 40°C.
Made in Turkey

Nursing Bra Fast Food has been awarded the Bizziebaby Silver Award 2012.

Style # 9301

name: Boob Before & After SS V-Neck Top
description:
This is a great basic tee with enough stretch to accommodate your growing belly for 9 months and just enough rouching to slim you down once your baby arrives. Featuring Boob's easy lift up, pull down nursing access, this top is designed with function & comfort in mind.

Double function nursing top for pregnancy and nursing. The top has soft v-neck and short sleeves. The rouched sides give a flattering fit over the belly, both during and after pregnancy. 


Soft knitted stretch fabric in 95% lyocell and 5% elastane. Machine washable, 40° C.
Made in Portugal

Style # 0139

name: Olian Ella Arabesque Print Dress
description:
We love the print of this dress, the flattering neckline which provides easy nursing access post pregnancy and the feel of the fabric which makes this an easy dress to dress up. 

This empire waist dress features a surplice neckline , princess panels, waist tie accent, and three-quarter sleeves.

Poly/Spandex Blend
Burgundy, Grey and Red Arabesque Print
Approximate length from high point shoulder:  37" 
Dry-Clean only

Style # O-8392-AD-33

name: Olian Camila Arabesque Dress
description:
A great dress from Olian for the office, an event or an evening out.

This dress features a boat neck, ruching details, A-line skirt and long sleeves.


Rayon/Spandex Blend
Black, Ivory and Purple Arabesque Print
Approximate length from high point shoulder:  Not Available  
Dry-Clean only

Style # O-8405-AD-29

name: Olian Eva Color Block Dress
description:
This is a fun and easy dress from maternity favorite Olian. Great during pregnancy and the crossover neckline allows for nursing access post pregnancy.

This color block style dress features a surplice neck, contrasting color waistband, gathered skirt and long sleeves.

Rayon/Poly/Spandex Blend
Powder Pink, Charcoal and Black Combination

Approximate length from high point shoulder:  37"  
Dry-Clean only

Style # O-8345-AD-12

name: J Brand Mama J Legging in Ash Sateen
description:
Looking for a super soft legging jean to wear throughout pregnancy and after? You won't want to take this super soft luxe sateen jean from J Brand off. 

Constructed in our new luxe sateen, this legging is designed for a mom-to-be who wants a new choice. This revolutionary new style is unlike any other maternity jean. J Brand added soft elastic panels on each side of the waistband for room to grow with each month and a higher back rise for added comfort.

Legging
6-Inch Front Rise
13.5-Inch Back Rise
10.5-inch Leg Opening
30-inch Inseam
7.6-Ounce Luxe Sateen
97% Cotton, 3% Elastane

name: Noppies Ellen Jacket
description:
A great winter coat to keep you warm on cool to cold days. Lined but not too puffy, this coat has a great shape and will take you all the way through your pregnancy. 

We love the stitching detail, the pockets and the removable faux fur trimmed hood. 

Made with 100% polyester inside and out. Faux fur is 79% polyester and 21% acrylic.

Wash Cold Water with like colors.
Remove faux fur from hood before washing - can be hand washed in cool water with soap and hung to dry.

name: Hatch Things Sureshop Bag (TM)
description:
A genius new shopping bag that attaches to your stroller from the creator of the Cold Snap (and a Brooklyn mama).

STOP CRYING OVER SPILLED MILK!

Keep your precious cargo safe with our new patent-pending reusable shopping bag.

Just how does it work? When you clip SURESHOP onto the front frame of your stroller, it redistributes the weight back towards the stroller's center of gravity to keep your stroller standing. And if you are tired of bag drag, slip the handle into the pocket in the strap to prevent it from sliding down to the ground. Once you're done, scrunch it back into the self-storing pouch and toss it into your your purse or stroller. 

Holds up to 12 pounds on each side - that's plenty of juice, eggs and milk. Fill it up and you are good to go! 

There are also clips at the top of the bag so you can attach it to strollers with one handlebar or hang it from your shopping cart, back of your chair, bike handles, etc. So even if you are not with the kiddies, you are sure to make good use of it.

name: Ingrid & Isabel Crossover Panel™ Active Capri Pant
description:
Finally, an Active Pant that supports you as you grow! The Crossover Panel™ features a uniquely engineered crossover back design to support lower back joints throughout and after pregnancy. As your belly grows, the panel applies gentle pressure at the intersection of your lower back providing comfort and support.

Crossover Panel™ Features:
Crossover back design supports lower back
Contoured belly panel grows with you
Can be pulled up or folded down for versatile comfort

Overall Features:
Four-way stretch fabric allows full range of motion
Moisture wicking and antimicrobial for greater breathability
Flat-lock stitching minimizes chafe
Capri length is fit for every workout at any level

Body: 87% Nylon / 13% Spandex 
Belly: 90% Nylon / 10% Spandex

Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. No iron.

Crossover Panel™ Patent Pending

description:
Finally, an Active Pant that supports you as you grow! The Crossover Panel™ Active Long Pant features a uniquely engineered crossover back design to support lower back joints throughout and after pregnancy. name: Paige Verdugo Full Panel Maternity Jean in Reina
description:
We are a big fan of Paige jeans and this new legging with a full belly panel is a great option for fall & winter. Their verdugo jean has been a best seller for us for a while now, so this is a great addition to add to your maternity wardrobe in a nice dark wash.

A maternity, super stretch ultra skinny that hugs the leg down to the leg opening. This jean features a nylon flap that covers the entire stomach and sits underneaths the chest.

Inseam: 30"

43% Lyocell / 28% Cotton / 27% Cupro / 2% PU

Style# 9001416-1526 W1526

name: Plush Footless Fleece-Lined Maternity Tights (more colors)
description:
Finally, a pair of warm and comfortable tights for expecting moms has arrived! Forget those itchy wool tights, Plush's super soft, fleece-lined tights will keep you warm all winter long. They can be worn as stockings with skirts and dresses, but are thick enough to wear as leggings too. With a comfortable, non-binding, Over Belly waistband, Plush tights are designed to add warmth with no extra bulk, so that every expecting mom can Stay Warm AND Stylish®!

Sizing (based on pre-pregnancy weight):
Small/Medium:   4'10" - 5'4";    95 - 125 lbs.
Medium/Tall:  5'2" - 5'7";    120 - 150 lbs. 
Large:   5'5" - 5'11";     145 - 175 lbs.
* NOTE: Maternity tights feature double rear seams.


- 93% Polyester, 7% Spandex
- Hand Wash Separately in Cold Water.  Line Dry. Do Not Use Bleach. Do Not Iron.  

- Due to the special dyes of this product, please beware that fabric may stain.  Please enjoy with like colors :)

Style # MT101L

name: Plush Fleece-Lined Overbelly Matte Leggings
description:
A great new legging with a dressed up look from Plush (known for their cozy maternity & non-maternity leggings). This is a great looking and even better - a super cozy legging to keep you warm, comfortable & chic all winter long.

These are a new thinner, matte spandex for an extra stylish touch. These ever-so-soft leggings feature a comfy Over-Belly waistband perfect for your growing belly, you’ll never want to wear anything else.

US	Denim	Plush

8-10	30-31	L
*based on pre-pregnancy size

name: Mama NYC Alexis Dress in Navy

An easy dress to carry you through pregnancy with lovely details to make this dress one of your go to items even after you have your baby.

Features:

Beautifully gathered yolk, ¾ dolman sleeve, and adjustable drawstring at empire waist.

Style # 11109
Made in the NYC.

name: Mama NYC Laura Dress in Mitsi Print
description:
We love this classic dress from Mama NYC in a subtle grey floral Liberty art print. Crisp cotton, fine tayloring and subtle details make this a perfect dress to wear throughout your pregnancy and after (button downs make for easy nursing access).

Features:
Three tiers with shirring to conceal bump
Simple banded collar, and keyhole closure at wrist.
Eight buttons at center front allows easy access for nursing.

100% Cotton 
Machine wash
Made in the NYC

Style#  11101 
London's esteemed Liberty Art Fabrics

name: Maternal America Kimono Sleeve Dress
description:
A fun & versatile dress from California based Maternal America. This dress is a best seller season after season and we love the mojito stripe for fall. Made of a jersey with a bit of stretch, a little texture and fully lined, this dress has great cap sleeve details, a ruched neckline and empire waist that will show off your bump.

Poly/Cotton/Rayon/Spandex Blend with Poly lining
Hand Wash/Dry Flat or Dry Clean

name: Slacks & Co. Athens Cigarette Trouser with Slit (more colors)

A classic trouser from a company that know how to do suiting best - UK based Slacks & Co. This trouser feels & looks great on.

name: Slacks & Co. Chelsea Over Belly Cigarette Jean
description:
This is a classic jean from UK based Slacks & Co. known for their suiting and great fitting trousers. The denim is super soft with just the right amount of stretch, a slim fit and great over belly jersey panel that can be folded down as well. 

High-rise bellyband
Cigarette maternity jeans
Functional back pockets
Fly stitching
Super stretch denim

Made in Europe

name: Slacks & Co. Soho Over Belly Skinny Jean
description:
We'll have these jeans back in stock for spring.

These are a super soft jean with nice stretch and a comfortable over belly panel that will carry you all the way through your pregnancy and fit great as you transition into your non-maternity jeans post-pregnancy. 

High rise belly- band
Skinny maternity jeans

name: Slacks & Co. Capetown Cape Coat (more colors)
description:
We love this cape coat that just arrived for fall from UK based Slacks & Co - known for their expert tailoring and great fit. We are thrilled to have the collection at Bump for the first time!

You will want to wear this coat long after your baby arrives. It is classic and has great details.

Oversized-collar coat with clipable sleeves
Hidden front button fastening
Belt

Wool coating

name: 9Fashion Sadi Jacket
description:
A fashionable down jacket from 9Fashion Maternity with a diagonal front zip, front snap pockets & faux fur trimmed hood. This coat will keep you warm all winter long. Cut to accommodate your growing belly and long enough to cover your bum. 

Composition: polyester outer layer with polyester fill

name: 9Fashion Bivan Trouser
description:
A great dressed up black twill jean from 9Fashion maternity. Slim legs with front seam & front slash pockets. Yoke back detail and no back pockets makes for a slim back.

Over belly panel that can be folded under belly as well.

Composition: Cotton 96%, Elastane 4%

name: 9Fashion Milly Belted Dress
description:
This is a great updated little black dress from 9Fashion - perfect for work or a night out with a little statement detail.

Knee length, fitted body with front rivets & stitching detail. V-Back with silver snap detail. Comes with faux leather snap detailed belt.


Polyester 88%, Elastane 12% / Viscose 94%, Lycra 6%.

name: Paige Denim Jimmy Jimmy Skinny Maternity Jean
description:
An easy skinny boyfriend jean with just a little distressing that can be rolled up or full length. Fit perfectly with heels or tucked into boots or rolled up for a casual look with your favorite kicks. 

Super soft denim with extra stretch, comfortable under belly waist band with elasticized tabs to grow with your belly and transition with you post pregnancy.

69% Cotton/ 30% Polyester/ 1% Elastane

Machine wash cold inside out, tumble dry. Do not dry clean

name: Chewbeads Perry Necklace
description:
We are bigs fans of Chewbeads for all mamas whether your little ones are teething or not! Made of silicone beads, the necklaces are a bold pop of color that add a little fun to any outfit. 

	
Features:
~100% silicone beads (similar to pacifiers and nipples)
~Soft on babies gums and emerging teeth
~No BPA, phthalates, cadmium, lead, metals
~Easily cleaned with dish soap and water, also dishwasher safe
~Necklaces have a breakaway clasp for added safety
~Necklaces are a great sensory tool to help babies focus while nursing

name: Olian Sleep Set
description:
Olian is our to to for great pajama sets that you will want to lounge in during pregnancy and take with you to the hospital - especially the robe!

We love the paisley floral print with contrasting polka dots and how cute is the matching layette for baby?! Makes a perfect gift as well.

This 4 piece nursing pajama set features a sleeveless surplice neck top with a lace detail, paired with drawstring pants and sleep robe with waist tie accent. Set also includes matching baby night gown. Baby night gown features piped neckline, long sleeves, elastic hem.

100% Cotton

Approximate length: Top: 26 1/4" High Point Shoulder - Pants: 28 1/2" (inseam) Robe: 34"

name: Fragile Cat Graphic Knit Pullover
description:
We love this fun pullover for fall from Fragile. A super soft, lightweight knit and a bold cat to show off your bump this fall - go ahead and make a statement!

Cut long to cover your belly throughout pregnancy, color block sleeves & neck detail. Definitely a sweater you can wear long after your baby arrives.

55% Wool/45% Viscose
Hand wash or Dry Clean

Style # TWO1F-F3200

name: Fragile A-Line Print Dress
description:
A classic shape in a stunning print from Fragile. This dress feels sleek and sophisticated yes fresh and fun. Perfect for the office with a blazer or dressed up for a night out.

Double layered so it won't cling and great viscose fabric with just a little sheen for a polished look and feel.

93% Viscose/ 3% Elastane

Machine Wash Cool/ Dry Flat

name: Fragile Twisted Landscapes Dress
description:
This is a standout print from maternity favorite Fragile - a maternity line designed for pregnancy and beyond.

This dress has a twisted front, fitted tube bottom & fitted 3/4 length sleeves - great as a mini dress if you are petite or as a tunic with leggings if you are tall.

93% Viscose/ 7% Elastane

name: Bamboobies Brahhh - Maternity & Nursing Soft Bra
description:
This is a perfect bra for any woman looking for a little support and a lot of comfort. Great during pregnancy, easy to sleep in and an easy option for pull down nursing access. For those of us who are not so well endowed, it is the perfect everyday bra.

Better support than a sleep bra and made to adjust to your changing body.  Designed for pregnancy and nursing with adjustable, tapered straps that don’t fall down and easy pull-aside nursing access. No clips or clasps to struggle with or make you uncomfortable when sleeping.

Made with certified organic cotton, spandex and bamboo rayon for soft support and stretch. Wash and dry normally.  

Fair-trade: Made in Colorado, USA.

Don't forget to order your Bamboobies nursing pads as well!

name: Basq Mom2Be Spa Kit
description:
A perfect pampering gift for any expecting mama-to-be!

Indulge her with all the must haves for every expecting mom. With the big news comes big change. Whoever said women get that gorgeous pregnancy glow forgot about the sleepless nights, hormones wreaking havoc on skin and the ever dreaded fear of stretch marks. This is an all in one guide and answer to how to look and feel great during pregnancy. Each product is designed to relieve, revive and re-balance for gorgeous skin that really does have "That Glow". 

Kit includes: 
2 Resilient Body Oil 1/2 oz bottles
1 2 oz Rebalancing Face Cleanser plus Face Cleansing brush
1 oz Sweet Dreams Aromatherapy

Resilient Body Oil is our Gold Standard of Stretch Mark Oils. Quite simply, nothing nourishes skin like essential fatty acid rich oils. One of our Top Sellers for the prevention and repair of stretch marks, basq Resilient Body Oil blends the highest quality, skin nurturing oils available to protect you through the big stretch and beyond. Rebalancing Face Cleanser Cleans, Clarifies and Polishes the face for a truly radiant glow. Exfoliating micro beads, plant extracts and rich emollients deliver a fresh, fantastic clean slate. Tones without overstripping! For even more gentle polishing, our soft bristle brush is the perfect addition.  Use as often as desired for soft, refreshed skin that glows. Sweet Dreams Aromatherapy is a wonder for sleep and skin.  To enhance face cleansing, use with steamy water to open pores and refresh skin.  For instant stress reduction and better sleep, dab a little on and let the tension melt away. With all the changes the body goes through, nothing is better than a little relaxation. Lavender is natures best remedy for trouble sleeping and an instant way to relax the body and mind. Also wonderful for soothing little ones before naps and sleep.

name: Rosie Pope Plaid Maternity Pocket Shirt Dress - IN STORE ONLY
description:
A statement shirt dress from NYC based Rosie Pope.

As featured in FitPregnancy, the classic Rosie Pope Pocket Front Shirtdress is a maternity wardrobe staple. This maternity dress features a self-fabric belt and functional buttons down the front. Available in the perfect fall plaid and Liberty's Wiltshire print. ***

96% cotton, 4% Lycra
Machine wash cold with like colors. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Warm iron if needed. Remove belt before washing.

All Rosie Pope items are available for purchase in our Brooklyn boutique only at this time.

name: Pink Chicken Alexis Print Top
description:
An easy staple for pregnancy and anytime pregnant or not from contemporary line Pink Chicken. This top will fill through most of your pregnancy - maybe not at the end, but you will love the forgiving shape and easy lift up nursing access post-pregnancy.

100% Cotton

name: Babymel Katie Diaper Bag (more color options)
description:
Another classic bag from UK based Babymel.

Made from cool faux leather, this trendy lightweight satchel style bag with hoards of features will keep you organized from day to night. With a shoulder strap, which can also be worn across the body, and built in stroller straps for hands free ease to attach the bag to stroller, the Katie is ideal for all parents!

Features:
Integrated Strollerstraps
Insulated bottle pocket keeps liquids warm or cool for up to 4 hours
Padded changing mat to match lining
Wide zip top opening
Flap with dog clip front closure and contrast color webbing detail
Multi-striped long webbed, adjustable shoulder strap
Two external pockets
Four elasticated internal compartments
Internal zipped pocket for valuables
Laminated base
Water resistant, wipe clean Babymel lining
Dimensions: H 12.5in W 19.25in D 5in
Weight: 2.5 lbs

name: Storksak Python Tote
description:
A brand new statement bag for fall from UK diaper bag favorite Storksak.

Made from water repellent nylon with a fashionable contrasting base, the Storksak Tote is super lightweight and roomy. With its additional, adjustable long shoulder strap, the Tote is extremely versatile and can be comfortably worn as a shoulder or cross body bag. 

The Tote is equipped with all your essential accessories – a built in, insulated bottle holder, luxury padded changing mat and multiple compartments to keep yours and baby’s items organized and secure. Wipe clean fabrics and linings throughout make this changing bag one of our most practical choices for stylish parents. Large enough to fit most laptops, it doubles up perfectly as a weekend bag when off duty. 

Features:
- Made from beautifully soft, printed nylon
- Finished with silver hardware
- Two large elasticated inner storage pockets, one zipped pocket for valuables and one large Velcro closure compartment for clothes or diapers
- Built in Thermo-insulated bottle holder keeps liquids warm/cool for up to four hours (time will vary depending on external temperature)
- Luxury padded changing mat
- Additional removable, adjustable shoulder strap with built in Strollerstraps to attach bag to stroller for hands free ease
- Wide, top zipped closure
- Wipe clean linings throughout
- Will fit most laptops
- Weight: 2.4 lbs

name: NOM Molly Wrap Dress
description:
We love this wrap dress from NOM in crisp cotton & fun heart polka dots. Perfect for warm days as summer lingers and great layered with a cardi, tights & boots as cooler days arrive.

100% cotton. Machine wash, gentle cycle. Dry flat. 

Made in USA.

name: NOM Boxy Colorblock Tee
description:
One of NOM's best selling styles, this top is an everyday essential in a fun color block for fall. Great with leggings or jeans. Boxy shape with fitted sleeves - makes for a forgiving and flattering top you will want to wear throughout pregnancy. 

92% rayon, 8% spandex. Machine wash, gentle cycle. Dry flat. 

Made in USA.

name: NOM Fiona Print Top
description:
This is a fun blouse for everyday wear with jeans or dressed up with a pencil skirt & heels. Perfect for fall layering or a pop of print pair with your suit for work


100% rayon. Machine wash, gentle cycle. Dry flat. 

Made in USA.

name: Boob Franca Nursing Dress
description:
We love the look and fit of this nursing dress from Boob in a perfectly flirty & flattering polka dot. 

Nursing dress with double function for pregnancy and nursing. 3/4 sleeves, puffed at bottom. Overlap ties across the bust, but does not have to be undone when nursing. Length from shoulder 97 cm, in size M. 

Soft knitted stretch fabric in 95% lyocell and 5% elastane. Machine washable warm.
Made in Portugal

We will have size Medium back in stock very soon.

name: Boob Olivia Stripe Nursing Top
description:
This is a classic nursing top from Boob that is wearable year round and so easy. Wear it throughout pregnancy and after with easy lift up/pull down nursing access. We love our stripes and Boob knows how to put them to use.

Nursing top with rounded neck and long sleeves. Small side slits. Length from shoulder 69 cm, in size M. 
Soft knitted stretch fabric in 95% organic cotton and 5% elastane. Machine washable warm.
Made in Portugal

name: Boob Olivia Stripe Nursing Dress
description:
Another great basic nursing dress from Swedish favorite Boob and in a perfect stripe for fall.

Nursing dress with double function for pregnancy and nursing. Rounded neck and long sleeves. Bounded edge around neckline and shoulder yoke. Length from shoulder 93 cm, in size M. 

Soft knitted stretch fabric in 95% organic cotton and 5% elastane. Machine washable warm.
Made in Portugal

name: Mambino Organics Anti-stretch & Rebound Skin Duo
description:
The perfect duo from California based Mambino Organics. Soothe, protect and help prevent stretch marks with Oh Baby! Belly Butter™ and Moisture Me™ Body Toning Oil - perfect to keep your skin glowing during and after pregnancy.

You wouldn't dream of putting harsh chemicals on your baby's skin, so why would you put them on yours when you're pregnant? Processed at very low temperatures to keep all the goodness in, ingredients are kept active and effective without the use of any chemicals or additives. This duo features Disney's iParenting Award Winner Oh Baby! Belly Butter and skin quenching Moisture Me Body Toning Oil working together to restore skin elasticity and hydration while keeping your skin healthy, smooth and stretch mark free. A hint of red mandarin, lavender and sweet orange refresh and recharge your senses. After childbirth, continue to use to aid in the rebound of your fabulicious body.


Benefits:
oh baby! belly butter™ (4 oz / 114 g) - A rich, luxurious blend of nature's most nourishing and healing botanicals. What Happens: Softens the appearance of old and prevents new stretch marks.

moisture me™ body toning oil (2 oz / 60 ml) - A light refreshing body toning oil. What Happens: Boosts collagen production, firming trouble spots in the stomach, decollete, arms and legs.

name: Maternal America Chiffon Sleeve Sweater
description:
As featured in American Baby Magazine this month - the Maternal America Chiffon Sleeve Sweater is chic & sophisticated for cooler dressing. Pair with black pants for a night out or jeans for a dressed up every day outfit. 

Featuring knit front, stretch back & chiffon sleeves we love the detail and the pleated tuck around the shoulders. 

Polyester/Acrylic/Wool blend
Dry Clean Only
Made in USA

name: Ripe Suzie Super Straight Pant
description:
Another must have item from Ripe Maternity. The Suzie Super straight pant is perfect for the office and can be dressed up for a night out. Featuring an over belly panel that stays in place and sits higher at the front to give support during your pregnancy. 

This pant can double as a legging with boots and an over sized top, for fall layering. 

Viscose / Nylon / Elastane

name: Ripe Seamless Support Leggings
description:
These are a maternity essential from Ripe. Over tummy seamless leggings feature ribbing under tummy for extra support. Definitely an essential layering item for fall.

Nylon/Elastane

Fit true to pre-pregnancy size.

name: Ripe Bow Tie Blouse
description:
Another great staple from Australian maternity favorite Ripe. The bow tie blouse is feminine and easy, light weight and lovely in the shell pink. 

Woven Viscose top featuring 3/4 length sleeves with elastic cuffs, bow tie neckline, shirring on front shoulders and a curved hem. Loose fit through body. Versatile, key fashion item that can be worn casually or dressed up.

name: Tender Tots Unscented Protective Salve by Premae
description:
We are excited to be able to add UK based skincare line Premae's Tender Tots line to our assortment of skincare - perfect protection for delicate newborn skin.

Tender Tots Protective Salve has been especially created for delicate young children who are hypertensive to commercial nappy salves and cradle cap stearic creams, which are often alcohol, fragrance and allergen based. This salve is milk, egg, peanut, tree nut, fish, shellfish, soy, wheat, SLS, alcohol and paraben free. It contains a soothing natural antiseptic - Italian ylang ylang oil, for hypersensitive skin. It can also be used by mums as an intensive moisturizer. 

Apply to bottoms, cheeks, elbows, mama's hands - anywhere you need some intensive care!

Ingredients: Aqua, Caprylic / capric triglyceride (Light Coconut Oil), Glyceryl stearate & Peg100 stearate, Vitis vinifera (Grape) seed oil, Glycerin (Veg), Glyceryl stearate, Cetyl alcohol, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexyglycerin, Sodium bicarbonate, Tocopherol

The Tender Tots Range is for delicate young children prone to Eczema and are hypersensitive to commercial Baby wipes, Foaming Shower gels, perfumed products which are alcohol, fragrance and allergen based.

Tender Tots eliminates all allergens (Wheat, Dairy, Soy, Sugars, Yeast, Nuts), SLS, Alcohol and Parabens to provide stress-free, irritation-free, beautiful bath time for our precious little ones.

name: Tender Tots Regal Rose Protective Salve by Premae
description:
We are excited to be able to add UK based skincare line Premae's Tender Tots line to our assortment of skincare - perfect protection for delicate newborn skin.

Tender Tots Protective Salve has been especially created for delicate young children who are hypertensive to commercial nappy salves and cradle cap stearic creams, which are often alcohol, fragrance and allergen based. This salve is milk, egg, peanut, tree nut, fish, shellfish, soy, wheat, SLS, alcohol and paraben free. It contains a soothing natural antiseptic - Italian ylang ylang oil, for hypersensitive skin. It can also be used by mums as an intensive moisturizer.

Apply to bottoms, cheeks, elbows, mama's hands - anywhere you need some intensive care!

Ingredients: Aqua, Caprylic / capric triglyceride (Light Coconut Oil), Glyceryl stearate & Peg100 stearate, Vitis vinifera (Grape) seed oil, Glycerin (Veg), Glyceryl stearate, Cetyl alcohol, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexyglycerin, Sodium bicarbonate, Tocopherol, Rosewood Oil (Aniba rosaeaodora)

The Tender Tots Range is for delicate young children prone to Eczema and are hypersensitive to commercial Baby wipes, Foaming Shower gels, perfumed products which are alcohol, fragrance and allergen based.

Tender Tots eliminates all allergens (Wheat, Dairy, Soy, Sugars, Yeast, Nuts), SLS, Alcohol and Parabens to provide stress-free, irritation-free, beautiful bath time for our precious little ones.

name: Tender Tots Regal Rose 2in1 Bath & Body Oil by Premae
description:
We are excited to be able to add UK based skincare line Premae's Tender Tots line to our assortment of skincare - perfect protection for delicate newborn skin.

Tender Tots Bath and Body Oil provides a very gentle, allergen-free cleanse for both mother and baby. It can be poured onto a wash cloth and massaged into the child’s body, or several drops can be added under running water to build a silky emollient texture in the bath. It contains rosewood oil and British chamomile oil, for a calming, skin-nourishing soak. 

The Tender Tots Range is for delicate young children prone to Eczema who are hypersensitive to commercial Baby wipes, Foaming Shower gels, perfumed products which are alcohol, fragrance and allergen based.

Tender Tots eliminates all allergens (Wheat, Dairy, Soy, Sugars, Yeast, Nuts), SLS, Alcohol and Parabens to provide stress-free, irritation-free, beautiful bath time for our precious little ones.

Ingredients: Sunflower Oil (Helianthus annus),  Safflower Oil (Carthamus tinctorius), Rose Wood Oil (Aniba rosaeaodora, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene)

This range is also environmentally friendly and so completely natural and unrefined that it exceeds organic standards. Premae Sustainable Futures has also begun pioneering sustainable growth programs in Africa. It has a strong link with Ugandan villages, where it sources Cocoa Butter and Aloe Vera, which has blossomed into a full social enterprise, with a training program; ‘Premae Soap Success’ teaches the poorest and vulnerable young people how to manufacture their own products and provides an income for the whole community.

name: Seraphine Nessa Snap Shoulder Bamboo Nursing Top
description:
Arriving again next spring...

This is a brilliant top from UK based Seraphine and a customer favorite during and after pregnancy. Featuring a snap shoulder opening for quick nursing access, this easy to wear bamboo blend top is comfortable, functional and incredibly stylish. 

Features:
~Popper openings for easy access to breastfeed
~Soft viscose/bamboo fabric regulates temperate
~Long line body to cover hips and thighs
~Made in an innovative viscose/bamboo fabric that regulates your temperature, this top is perfect for when you are nursing. 

On top of being practical, it is comfortable as well as stylish. The popper detail is a trendy feature which adds an extra touch of chic, and can be opened with one hand for mothers on the go.

Originally $102

name: Seraphine Cici Faux Leather Panel Legging
description:
Looking for the standout legging of the season? The Cici legging from Seraphine is your answer. Featuring a faux leather front and stretch lycra back, these will be your dress up leggings during pregnancy and after.


Featuring:
Leather panels on the front
Stretch viscose body
Mid-bump band

65%Viscose 28%Polyamide 7%Elastane

name: Seraphine Jolene 3/4 Sleeve Knot Front Dress
description:
We'll have this dress back in stock very soon!

This is a super easy and flattering dress from UK based Seraphine. Wear it to work, your shower, a date night...the possibilities are endless and you will find that this quickly becomes a staple in  your fall and winter maternity wardrobe. Gathered neckline can be pulled over for easy nursing access as well. 

Gentle wash in cool water
Wash inside out
Wash dark colors separately
Warm iron
Do not tumble dry
95%Twisted Viscose 5%EA

name: Paige Premium Denim Skyline Maternity Bootleg
description:
A great new jean from Paige for fall, the Skyline is a slightly distressed, super comfortable boot cut jean for everyday wear. Featuring their super comfortable underbelly elasticized panels, you can wear these jeans from your first trimester through your third and post pregnancy as you transition into your pre-pregnancy jeans.

These jeans are super soft and have just the right amount of stretch.

10.25 oz Fabric
75% Cotton / 12% Lyocell / 12% Polyester / 1% Spandex

Please note the wash of the jeans is as pictured on the non-maternity jeans, but the cut and maternity panels are as pictured on the maternity model.

name: Seraphine Kitty 3/4 Sleeve Two Tone Dress
description:
We'll have this dress back in stock very soon!

This is a great dress for work and can easily be dressed up. We love the fit, the front pleat detail and the two-tone. 

Super soft jersey, boat-neck line, keyhole back button closure.

Machine wash Cold, Dry Flat
93%Viscose, 7%Elastane

name: Fragile Comfy Dress
description:
Another great style from Fragile arriving in September. The comfy dress is exactly that in a fabulous print and the great stretchy fabric Fragile is known for.

(dress pictured on right).

If you would like to be notified when Fragile arrives, please e-mail us at shop@bumpbrooklyn.com, otherwise check back in September.

name: Fragile Cupcake Print Blouse
description:
This is a fabulous and fun blouse from Fragile, known for their great prints, updated silhouettes and comfortable fabrics.

Relaxed fit, pleated shoulder detail, 3/4 sleeve. 

Half button down access or easy lift up access for nursing post pregnancy. 

We fell in love with the cupcake print of this silk blouse - how perfectly sweet!

100% Viscose

name: Two Violet Dress
description:
Another easy style from Two New York. Made of vintage khadi cotton, the Violet Dress is soft and sheer. Any easy style to wear to the beach or dress up for a night out. Great at any stage of pregnancy and long after. It even has easy nursing access via the arm hole.

100% Cotton
Gentle Wash Cold. Hang Dry

We suggest the Ingrid & Isabel Bamboo Slip to wear under this.

Originally $315

name: Two Seema Tunic in Pink
description:
We adore Brooklyn based Two New York - a contemporary line that embodies simple elegance. We wish we could live in their tunics and dresses all the time. 

They are stunning and breezy - perfect for hot summer days or layered on cooler spring & fall days. Pair with cropped jeans for a romp in the playground or dress up with a slip and heels for a night out.

Each piece is unique - made from cotton sari fabrics hand picked in India. 

The Seema Tunic in Pink is 100% cotton with metallic gold trim

One size fits most

Cold Wash Gentle Cycle

We suggest the Ingrid & Isabel Bamboo Slip to wear under this as it is sheer.

Originally $340

name: Two Monica Long Caftan (more colors)
description:
Another beautiful caftan from Brooklyn based Two - a line for any woman and the perfect cover up for the beach. No two are alike and each is spectacular, beautiful and feminine. Nursing mamas have easy nursing access via the armholes.

Made from vintage and new hand loomed & hand sourced saris from India.

Peach - 100% Cotton.
Purple - 100% Cotton with Silk Trim

Gentle Wash Cold. Hang to Dry

We suggest the Ingrid & Isabel Bamboo Slip to wear under this.

name: Nom Aurora Maxi Dress
description:
This is an easy strapless maxi dress from NOM that will take you from day to night and can easily be worn post baby (with easy pull down nursing access).

Super Soft stretch jersey & extra long (those of us who are not so tall may need to hem it a bit). This is a perfect dress for summer at the beach or the playground.

92% rayon, 8% spandex. 

Machine wash, gentle cycle. Dry flat.

Originally $140

name: Glamourmom® Nursing Bra Long Top with Adjustable Chest Band (B7)
description:
This is a great layering top with all the benefits and great features of the original style and now an adjustable chest band to fit you better than ever!

-Original, patented design for full discretion and support when nursing in public
-Full built-in nursing bra with adjustable chest band
-Guaranteed post-partum tummy coverage
-Extra length to mid-thigh for a more fashionable option
-Wide, adjustable, elastic bra straps for extra support
-Nursing bra hook closures for easy, one-handed access
-Machine washable
-92% Cotton, 8% Elastane

Style # B7

This is a regularly reordered style so if you do not see your size, please e-mail us at shop@bumpbrooklyn.com or call 718-638-1960 and we can get it for you.

name: Prego Maternity Empire Tank Swimsuit (More Colors)
description:
This is an easy and versatile swimsuit perfect for the beach or swimming laps in the pool. 

Featuring a padded, fuller bust coverage, flattering empire waistline and a hook back closure for a little extra support, this is a great suit.

Machine Wash Cold

name: Seraphine Tamara Post-Pregnancy Tummy Support Leggings
description:
Looking for a great legging to wear after you baby is born with the added bonus of tummy support, this is the perfect option. 

Seraphine's head designer Cecile was inspired to create these leggings whilst recovering from the birth of her son. Designed to make a post birth tummy look flatter and more toned whilst producing the appearance of slimmer thighs. Whilst these leggings help to smooth silhouette giving you the look of a sleek and leaner figure they also gently re-align the uterus and organs helping you to regain your pre-pregnancy figure in no time.

Gentle wash cold
Wash inside out
Wash dark colors separately
Warm iron
Do not tumble dry
83% Polyamide 17% Cotton

name: Baggu Medium Zipper Bags - Set of 3
description:
These are my favorite diaper bag accessory - perfect for organizing all the little things I need for my kids. 

These are the perfect size to hold pacifiers, wipes & a diaper or two, snacks, small toys - any little things you want to keep together and find easily in your bag. 

Includes three bags from 7" x 5.5" to 8" x 10". 100% Ripstop Nylon. Machine Washable.

name: Cotton Glam Sleeveless Raw Edge Nursing Top (more colors)
description:
This is an updated version of one of our all time favorite nursing tops (The Mia from Mayreau for those of you who have done this before). Mayreau is no longer, but this updated top from Cotton Glam holds up to the original with flying colors & in fabulous colors. Fitted, comfortable, easy access and a top you can wear throughout pregnancy and nursing, this is one top you need to have in your closet (maybe in every color).

Made of modal rayon & spandex, it is incredibly soft and stretchy, holds it shape and wears well. 

Machine wash gently cycle/Dry Flat

Style # 1271NM/S

name: Cotton Glam Sleeveless Low Banded Nursing Top
description:
This is a great nursing top for summer from California based Cotton Glam. Lose and comfortable, easy access & incredibly flattering. As you can see from the photo, it will work throughout pregnancy as well, so a great piece to add to your wardrobe now!

Made of modal jersey with just enough stretch, you will wear this top over and over again.

Machine wash but hang dry.
Modal/Spandex Blend

Style # 1252NM

name: Baggu Duck Bag
description:
Looking for the perfect tote that can double as a diaper bag? The Duck Bag from Baggu is our favorite option. Versatile, fun and of course practical, you will love this bag.

A tote bag in durable recycled cotton canvas duck.
Two handles and 40" adjustable strap, to carry in
hand or over shoulder. 

16" high, 10" wide, 5.5" deep.
Updated style features matte silver hardware, durable
taped seams, and a round inner pocket. 16oz recycled cotton canvas.

name: 9Fashion Lusso Twill Shorts
description:
These are a flattering and comfortable short from 9Fashion Maternity - exactly what you need on a hot summer day. Featuring an internal elasticized waistband, front & back pockets & a little tab on the sides for added styling.

Super soft brused twill fabric with a little stretch.

Cotton/Elastane blend
Made in Poland

Please note actually shorts are navy blue with a grey interior waistband (not black as photographed).

Originally $84

name: Olian Denim Tie Shorts
description:
These are an easy, versatile summer short from Olian. Featuring a soft, stretchy waistband and drawstring closure, these will fit throughout pregnancy and as you transition back into your non-maternity clothes post pregnancy.

Five-pocket styling
Approx. inseam: 9 1/2".
Approx. rise: front 9"; back 15".
Cotton/polyester; machine wash.
Imported

Originally $76

name: Ingrid & Isabel Ditzy Floral Maxi Dress
description:
This is a lovely chiffon dress from Ingrid & Isabel - perfect for a shower or a summer wedding. 

This flirty and fun printed maxi dress offers maximum comfort and ultimate style. Adjustable self belt makes this the perfect piece for before, during, and after pregnancy.

-Adjustable self-belt to transition easily from maternity to non- maternity wear
-Generous cut makes this flattering on all body types

100% Polyester Lining: 100% Polyester

Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, with like colors. Line dry. Do not dry clean. Iron low heat.

name: Yana K Tara Mini Dress - Exclusive to Bump (more colors)
description:
We finally got in more dresses from contemporary designer Yana K and had prints made just for us. This is a fabulous dress during pregnancy and looks just as wonderful post baby (given the tie front, you can even nurse in it). What's not to love? A beautiful, easy silk dress you can continue to wear.

Runs generous though will get a bit shorter in front as your belly grows.

description:

cotton 95%, elastane 5%

description:
Looking for a statement baby carrier made in NYC? The brand new denim carriers from REWEAR NYC are all about being unique and comfortable - just like your favorite pair of jeans.

Made of recycled and sterilized jeans into a unique one-of-a-kind baby carrier, lined with soft T-shirt material on the inside keeping the little one comfortable. Made in NYC print inside carrier.

100% Cotton
Folds up nice and compact

name: Ingrid & Isabel Bamboo Maternity Slip
description:
Looking for an easy slip? Ingrid & Isabel's Bamboo Slip is our favorite!

This is a super soft chemise to wear under a dress or on its own as a nightgown during pregnancy & after.

100% Bamboo
Hand Wash

name: Cake Lingerie Toffee Nursing Tank
description:
This is a great seamless tank from Australia based Cake Lingerie. Made for nursing, it fits throughout pregnancy and feels great on. 

The versatile Seamless Nursing Tank is the ideal figure-hugging camisole, which can be worn under outerwear or as sleepwear, for full body support. A hidden in-built bra with fabric-molded cups provides a secure profile and fit, which grows with your curves. Wear this for an extra layer of warmth and support, or casually with a pair of jeans!

name: Mothers En Vogue Kimono Tie Nursing Dress
description:
We love this easy dress with simple nursing access (via the sleeve) from Mothers En Vogue. You will love having it in your wardrobe long after you stop nursing. Made of a lightweight bamboo/rayon blend, this dress is slightly sheer but comes with a full length jersey slip and feels great on. 

Dress it up or wear it everyday, you can't go wrong with this dress in the summer. Swap the sash for a little belt and you've got a whole new look.

50% Bamboo & 50% Rayon 
 
Machine wash cold, gentle with like colors.
Do not bleach.
Do not tumble dry.
Do not dry clean.
Iron at low heat.
Wash before wearing.

Because of the natural waistline and slimmer fit of this dress, it will only work during the first trimester of your pregnancy.

Originally $102

name: Mothers En Vogue Macrame Sundress
description:
Looking for a cool summer dress with nice detail and easy nursing access?

The Macramé Sundress is from Mothers En Vogue's X.tended Collection and has been designed to be worn during pregnancy as well as post-partum.
 
Made of 100% woven cotton with focal macramé detail on bodice, this dress has a fitted top and flares out to an A-Line silhouette. This dress features side seam zip access for breastfeeding functionality. 

100% Cotton

Machine wash warm, gentle with like colors.
Do not bleach.
Do not tumble dry.
Do not dry clean.
Iron at medium heat.
Wash before wearing.

Originally $95

name: Mothers En Vogue Soft Nursing Tank
description:
This is a super soft nursing tank from Mothers En Vogue. Made of bamboo with a little stretch, this is a perfect layering top and easy on its on during warm summer days. 

Featuring a lift up front layer, you can nursing easily without feeling exposed. 

95% Bamboo 5% Spandex
 
Machine wash cold, gentle with like colors.
Do not bleach.
Do not tumble dry.
Do not dry clean.
Iron at low heat.
Wash before wearing.

Originally $50

name: Mothers En Vogue Tara Dress
description:
Another easy dress from the Mothers En Vogue X.TENDED (TM) Collection. This dress can be worn thru pregnancy and is designed with easy nursing access in mind. We love the sweet spring print and this is a great dress for a petite customer as it is shorter.  

Made of super soft stretch modal, you won't want to take this dress off. 

95% Modal and 5% Spandex

Machine wash cold gentle with like colours.
Do not bleach.
Do not tumble dry.
Do not dry clean.
Iron at low heat.
Wash before wearing.

Originally $94

name: Mothers En Vogue Frills & Grace Maxi Dress
description:
We love the soft simplicity of this maxi dress from Mothers En Vogue. Fit to be worn throughout pregnancy and designed with easy nursing access in mind. This is a feminine summer dress that should be a staple in your wardrobe. Perfect for the beach or garden party.

Constructed with neckline nursing access, and featuring a concealed button down placket for discreet breastfeeding. Internal cami lining is made from knitted cotton jersey & elasticized straps are adjustable.

100% Cotton

Machine wash warm, gentle with like colours.
Do not bleach.
Do not tumble dry.
Do not dry clean.
Iron at medium heat.
Wash before wearing.

Originally $125

name: Mothers En Vogue Britney Bubble Nursing Top
description:
This is a fun and easy nursing top from Mothers En Vogue. Soft and colorful - it is a great addition to your summer wardrobe. It features and easy pull-over nursing access, lightweight double layer fabric and is forgiving on your waist line post pregnancy. 

Outer layer: 67% bamboo, 28% cotton and 5% spandex jersey knit

Lining: 100% cotton 
 
Machine wash warm, gentle with like colors.
Do not bleach.
Do not tumble dry.
Do not dry clean.
Iron at medium heat.
Wash before wearing.

Originally $72

name: Cake Lingerie Cotton Candy Seamless Luxury Bra
description:
This is a nursing essential for any new mom. Any easy bra for everyday, perfect for mommy & baby yoga classes, and incredibly comfortable during pregnancy.

The Luxury Seamless Maternity & Nursing Bra is silky soft & built for comfort. It's carefully positioned double-layered side sling, strength panels and T-back structure are designed to maximize lift and support. The Luxurious Seamless Maternity/ Nursing Bra is ideal during the initial stages of pregnancy, immediately post childbirth and as a sleep-bra, when your breasts are rapidly changing in size & shape. This bra will grow to accommodate your changing bust without restriction.

Features:
-Easy Sizing - S, M, L, XL (see chart)
-Fashionable colors and several designer elements
-Innovative low T-back for medium levels of support
-Fabric molded cups for smooth seamless appeal
-Side Sling for discreet feeding & shape
-No itchy garment tags
-Adjustable hooks & eyes for fitting preference
-Great elastic stretch & memory
-Additional side panel support ribbing
-90% Polyester 10% Elastane (excl of trims)
-Cool machine wash

name: Maternal America Skinny Ankle Denim Jean
description:
A tried and true favorite style is now available in a dark denim wash. This ankle jean from Maternal America has been a customer favorite in the colored twill versions season after season and now it is a perfect option in a casual washed denim. 

This is a great jean for petite customer as a full length jean and great for everyone else as an ankle length go to. Perfect year round and a great transitional jean with its wide underbelly band that helps keep these jeans up.

name: Seraphine Matilda Floral Print Maxi Dress
description:
This is a perfect summer dress. Easy and breezy, long and cool. It can also be worn post pregnancy and allows for pull-over nursing access - all at a great price! What more could you ask for? 

Features:
Full coverage at the back
Crossover neckline for easy breastfeeding
Elasticated shoulder straps

Machine Wash Cool, Hang to Dry
Cool iron
100% Cotton

name: Vanessa Knox Cora Maternity Pencil Skirt
description:
This is super soft easy skirt from UK based Vanessa Knox Maternity - great for work or dressed up for a night out. It also works well as a transitional skirt post pregnancy. 

Soft modal stretch jersey, knee length, pull on, sits below bump, double layer, wide elastic waistband.

Easy Care, Machine Wash Cold, Lay Flat to Dry.

94% MicroModal / 6% Elastane

Runs a little generous so order down a size.

Originally $89

name: Ripe Harper Sleeveless Nursing Top
description:
This is a fabulously flattering nursing top from Ripe Maternity. Perfect for the office and easy for a night out, this top layers well and looks great. This top can easily be worn during pregnancy as well. 

Details from Ripe:
Viscose / Elastane knit sleeveless maternity nursing top. Features ruched side seams and layered panels over the bust which can be lifted for feeding access. A stylish nursing top which can be worn during and after your pregnancy.

Fits true to size

Originally $92

name: Poncho Baby™ Nursing Cover
description:
This is a great new multi-functional nursing cover option for mamas looking for a bit more coverage without drawing attention to themselves while nursing. Created by a California based mother of two girls, this is an eco-friendly & smartly designed product. 

Why will you love Poncho Baby™ Cover?
• Patent-pending design allows mom to easily view the baby while breastfeeding.
• Provides front and back coverage. No more accidental peek-a-boos!
• 100-percent breathable premium cotton is super-soft and breathable.
• Two inside pockets for holding nursing pads, burp cloths or pacifiers.
• Machine wash and dry.
• Multifunctional: you can use Poncho Baby™ as a blanket, stroller cover, car seat canopy, stylish poncho or sunshade.
• Made in the USA with premium imported fabrics.
• Compact, easy to fold and toss into a diaper bag.
• Soothing fabric colors keep your baby calm and are neutral enough to go with any outfit you are wearing.
• Great for bottle feedings, too, providing privacy and blocking out distractions.
• Provides protection from chills and accidental exposure when you are pumping at work.

name: Rosie Pope Pret Pant - IN STORE ONLY
description:
A best selling classic over belly pant from Rosie Pope - perfect the the office or a night out.

from Rosie...

If you only buy one pant during your pregnancy, this should be it. Made from heavy-duty Euro-stretch twill, this pant is both forgiving and shaping and has a super slimming straight leg that is perfect for work or play. 

This pant runs small, so we suggest sizing up one or two sizes.

Hand wash cold separately; lay flat to dry. 
72% rayon / 22% nylon / 6% lycra.

name: Rosie Pope Classic Shopper Diaper Bag - IN STORE ONLY
description:
This is the ultimate diaper bag you will be using long after your babe is out of diapers.

From Rosie...
The Rosie Pope London Shopper Classic Diaper Bag is as stylish as it is durable. From its washable interior with ample pockets for bottles and diapers to the discrete stroller straps and included changing pad, this is simply the perfect diaper bag. 100% leather outer with 100% nylon lining. 8"x 21"x12". Weighs approximately 5 lbs. Stroller straps / changing pad / removable washable lining included.

You can purchase this bag in our Brooklyn Boutique or call 718-638-1960 to order over the phone.

Originally $365

name: Ingrid & Isabel Cozy Wrap
description:
We'll have this wrap back in stock very soon!

The perfect year round wrap that you will continue to use post pregnancy - perfect for snuggling up with your babe. 

A chic and lightweight wrap that's sure to become an everyday staple in your maternity wardrobe and long after baby arrives.
~Ultra-soft, lightweight loop French terry
~Easy and versatile wear from day to night
~Relaxed drape flatters all silhouettes

100% Cotton Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low heat.

Style # 1245

This is a style we regularly reorder so e-mail us at shop@bumpbrooklyn.com to be notified when it is back in stock!

name: Ingrid & Isabel Convertible Maxi Dress (more colors)
description:
Ingrid & Isabel continues to come out with fabulous maternity staples & fashion pieces and this dress is no exception. A perfect to do for summer....

A spring and summer must have! This versatile maxi dress can be worn strapless or as a halter for extra support.

~Easy to convert straps tie around the neck for versatile wear
~Soft and comfortable to wear throughout the day

90% Modal 10% Spandex

Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron low heat.

Cotton/Nylon/Spandex Blend

Delicate or Hand Wash Cold/Lay Flat to Dry

Originally $100

name: Fillyboo Maternity Tee for Two Maxi Dress
description:
We have been waiting a long time to receive the Fillyboo Collection from Australia and it will be arriving very soon...

An easy maxi dress you can wear all summer (and many summers to come). Soft & stretchy, this dress with grow with you and feel nice and cool on hot summer days.

About
- Super soft cotton rib jersey maternity tee dress.
- This dress has a stunning cut which suits all body types.
- Available in S, M, L.
- This style runs true to size.
- Gorgeous bold stripes, flattering to all!

Rayon/Poly blend

Style T5465

name: Avarcas Pons Classic Flat
description:
We love these easy and comfortable flats for summer, slip on and go (no bending over and adjusting). They come in great colors and you will live in them...pregnant or not.

Handmade in Spain with top quality materials, such as natural leather on the upper and lightweight rubber molds on the sole, the avarca is a trendy and functional sandal.

We find these flats run a little generous so we suggest ordering down a size for a better fit. You want to them to be a little snug to start as they will stretch.

If your size isn't in stock or you are looking for another color, just e-mail us at shop@bumpbrooklyn.com and we can order it for you!

Handmade in Spain

Upper Leather

name: Imanimo Hadar Cotton Dress
description:
Simple and chic, classic and cool - this is the perfect dress for a warm summer day. Zipper back, front pockets and just enough tailoring to give this cotton dress a super flattering shape.



Sleeveless under belly
Cotton dress
Fabric: Cotton
100%cotton

Machine wash cold water with similar colors
Do not bleach

name: Vanessa Knox Josephine Maxi Maternity Dress
description:
A fabulous maxi dress with lots of potential, plenty of room to go grow and perfect post-pregnancy.

Details from Vanessa Knox:
Our full-length empire line maternity dress is every bit the Oscar winner. A triumph of show stopping glamour in super soft modal jersey with ruched bust and wide gathered shoulder straps to wear on or off the shoulder for a touch of arm cover. Pleated under the bust so that swathes of jersey gently drape over your bump to a tapered hem create a sleek figure. Red carpet ready and sure to turn heads, with nothing but a statement cocktail ring to complete the look.

Josephine Maxi Maternity Dress: modal stretch jersey, full length maternity dress, empire line, 2 way shoulder straps, ruched bust, slip on.

Easy Care - Machine Wash, lay flat to dry 

94% MicroModal / 6% Elastane
