name: Belabumbum Dottie Chemise & Robe (sold separately)
description:
We hope to have this back in stock again soon.

Looking for an easy sleep set for pregnancy and after baby arrives, the Dottie Chemise & Robe from Belabumbum is a lovely option. We love the classic, feminine styling, soft fabric, lace trim and of course who can resist the polka dots? Separate or together, it is perfect gift as well!

Chemise details:
Soft cup shelf bra offers light support
Easy clip-down or pull over nursing access    
Delicate contrast lace
Comfortable stretch straps
Knee length
100% Pima Jersey

Robe details:
¾ Kimono sleeves
Easy nursing access
Contrast lace trim at front and waist
Ribbon waist tie
Knee length
100% pima cotton jersey

Please note Chemise & Robe are sold separately, so please add both items to your cart if you would like to have the set.

name: Vanessa Knox Briony Maternity Trench Coat
description:
We are pleased to finally have Vanessa Knox at Bump and just in time for spring weather. The Briony Trench Coat is a classic coat & an essential for your spring wardrobe!

Details from Vanessa Knox:
More than a Mac, our beautifully tailored maternity trench coat comes in crisp, lightweight taffeta to add instant chic to any look that lasts beyond pregnancy. Adjustable belt loops allow it to be worn over bump then on your waist after baby. The perfect transitional coat with a twist on classic detailing in a wonderful new neutral that reveals its lustrous sheen.

Briony Maternity Trench Coat: Polyester taffeta, lightweight coat, detachable hood, long sleeves, button fastening at front, shoulder epaulettes, buttoned cuff bands, drawstring hem, adjustable belt loops, belt, pearlised coconut shell buttons.

Dry Clean Only

Outer: 88% Polyester / 12% Polyamide   
Lining: 50% Viscose / 50% Acetate

Originally $359

name: The Dairy Fairy Arden All-In-One Nursing Bra
description:
This great nursing & pumping bra from The Dairy Fairy has quickly become a Bump customer favorite. It is a brand new bra (came out spring 2013) designed for nursing & pumping mamas in mind (you can even nurse and pump at the same time). Featuring an adjustable band and two different access points, this is a versatile bra you will want to have on hand when you delivery your baby.

~Handsfree pumping using a layer that provides a tight fit for a breast shield
~Fold down nursing panel so baby can have easy and complete access to the breast
~Both sides are independent, to allow for simultaneous pumping and nursing
~Convenient and efficient – Wear this bra all day, with no need to disrobe and change into an alternate hands free pumping bra
~Innovative top cross over design to adjust the fit to your changing fullness level, create cleavage and remind you which breast was last used
~Adjustable back straps that can be crossed for a racerback option
~Sexy and appealing design, that complements a woman’s figure, with feminine touches of lace trim, and practical color options
~Superior fit and comfort with soft cotton spandex with just the right amount of stretch
~Compatible with all popular breast pump makes and models
~Patent pending

name: Fragile Floral A-Line Skirt
description:
Another standout print & easy basic from Fragile. This is a perfect skirt for spring layering and hot summer days. Wear it over belly or under depending on your mood. We love it as a statement piece showing off your belly with a little tank or tee as photographed. Fully lined.

95%Viscose/5%Elastane

Machine wash/line dry or dry clean

Fits true to size and maybe even a little small.

Style # M1103

Originally $139

name: Fragile Flowers Halter Dress (more prints)
description:
Just seeing this print makes me happy. What a perfect dress for a day in the sunshine. This is what make Fragile such a great line - wonderful prints, stretchy fabric & great bodies to make you look and feel great. 

Please note dress in stock is yellow floral print - not print photographed.

95% Viscose/5% Elastane
Machine wash warm/hang to dry

Originally $154

name: Boken Everyday Diaper Bag (Select Colors on Sale)
description:
Already a customer favorite & selling fast...we have the new fall version with a few updates and better reinforced around the seams & straps.

We love these lightweight diaper bags from California based Boken. 

It is the perfect unisex, utilitarian, yet stylish diaper bag, built by moms to help you organize and simplify!

*Tote with detachable messenger and backpack straps 
*Wipes clean 
*Large inner mesh pocket and zip pocket 
*Outer flap baby bottle pocket 
*Outer mesh water bottle pocket 
*2 front easy access pockets for personal items 
*All folds into a small zip pouch for easy storage & traveling 
*Baby-wearing friendly - backpack distributes weight evenly to reduce back strain 
*Bag 13.5" x 16" x 6.5" 
*Extra large diaper pad: 22” x 24”
*Light weight - only 13oz!

name: Belabumbum Serena Spacer Nursing Bra
description:
This is a super comfortable & supported nursing bra with nice shaping & lace detail. 

Lightweight contour cups are made with spacer foam technology that is breathable and adapts like a second skin. A perfect combination of comfort, function and beauty.

Wireless
Breathable, super thin spacer pad
Delicate lace trim
Adjustable straps
One handed nursing closures
Microfiber: 82% nylon, 12% lycra
Lace: 82% nylon, 18% spandex

name: Dote Emily Nursing Shirtdress
description:
This is an easy summer style for nursing mamas. This dress will also work during your first and second trimesters. Great for anyone looking for a little arm coverage and a blousier fit. Featuring button nursing access, a smocked waist that is flattering immediately after baby is born, and elbow length sleeves with button detail. This is a dress you will wear over and over again. 

Content: 100% Polyester
Wash Instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle

Originally $130

name: Dote Joan Nursing Dress
description:
Another fresh new nursing style for spring from one of our favorite lines - Dote. We love the color, the shape and the versatility of this dress. Perfect for a summer wedding, a day at the beach or a stroll in the city. Also great for a larger busted mama. We love the faux wrap and petal like feel of the skirt - you will definitely be blossoming in this dress.

Easy pull-over/lift-up nursing access. 

Content: 91% Rayon, 9% Spandex

Wash Instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle

Please note belt is not included, but you can add your own in any color you choose.

name: Dote Betty Nursing Dress
description:
We could have been more excited to see the new nursing collection from Dote for spring. The dresses and styles are beautiful and it is so nice to see new fabrics. These dresses are great for every day but also perfect for a night out or the office.

We love the Betty dress for its simple shape, easy fit and chiffon pleated skirt.

Content: 95% Rayon, 5% Spandex, 100% Polyester (skirt)
Wash Instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle

Originally $130

name: NOM Ruched Snap Maternity & Nursing Tank
description:
We were so excited that NOM decided to add nursing basics to their line. The ruched tank is an essential for any nursing mama. Easy to wear during pregnancy with ruched sides and plenty of stretch, this tank has a snap opening with pull over and lift up nursing access. 

Perfect on its own during the summer or easily layered with a cardigan when it is cooler.

Fits true to size.

92% rayon, 8% spandex. Machine wash. Dry flat. 

Made in USA.

name: NOM Surplice Maternity & Nursing Long Sleeve Tee
description:
This is a great basic from California based NOM. Easy & super comfortable during pregnancy and transitions perfectly for nursing once baby is born. Featured ruched sides, easy pull over/lift up nursing access and plenty of stretch. 

This will become an essential you will wear over and over.

Fits true to size, though order up one size if you are fuller busted.

92% rayon, 8% spandex. Machine wash. Dry flat. 

Made in USA.

name: Mama NYC Sue Dress
description:
We are eagerly awaiting the delivery of our spring styles from newcomer Mama NYC - their collection is well tailored and easy to wear. We love the fabrics and the simplicity of the styles and you will too. The Sue Dress is no exception. 

Featuring heavyweight ponte fabric, pockets & a boatneck - this dress is a classic.

60%Rayon 33%Nylon 7%Spandex.
Machine wash
Imported yarn
Lovingly made in New York City

Originally $195

name: Amoralia Reglisse Tankini
description:
We'll get this back in stock again soon.

This is a classic tankini from UK based Amoralia. A great shape, nice support & just enough coverage, classic navy - you can't go wrong with this two-piece. Try it and you will see why it is a tried and true best seller!

~quick-drying fabric that's UVA and UVB resistant to protect your bump
~fully lined cups
~elastic under the bust for greater support
~silver buckle on the tankini that is heat resistant and suitable for sea and chlorinated water
~the top is ruched and cut longer to cover your bump, and won't ride up or fill with water as the hem is elasticated
~machine wash cold

name: Amoralia Juniper One-Piece Swimsuit
description:
This is a flattering one-piece from UK based Amoralia. It has nice coverage and support and a great shape. Easy for swimming in the pool or trips to the beach. We love the extra support of the double straps and the cinched tie bust.

~quick-drying fabric that's UVA and UVB resistant to protect your bump
~fully lined cups
~double layer at the bust and pretty 2 strap detail to offer very ~good support - perfect for antenatal swim classes
~ruched along the side seam to accommodate your growing bump
!machine wash cold

Fits true to size.

name: Amoralia Second Skin Seam Free Boy Short
description:
Looking for a perfectly comfortable panty to wear during and after pregnancy? We love Amoralia's Second Skin Short. It is smooth and sits low in front and has generous coverage in back.

~curved at the front to sit comfortably under your bump
~invisible elastics for zero VPL
~generous flattering coverage at rear
~cotton-lined gusset for comfort
~machine washable

name: Amoralia Second Skin Nursing Bra
description:
We love the simplicity of this nursing bra from UK based Amoralia Lingerie. It is smooth and supportive with a removable padding for extra shape and coverage. It will become one of your favorites.

~silky-soft stretchy microfiber to your changing shape
~lower center front makes it great to wear with any lower cut summer top or wrap dresses
~removable foam pads for a sleek t-shirt bra appearance
~supportive sling in cotton jersey to support your bust whilst breastfeeding
~standard plastic clips that open one-handed for easy feeding
~6 row hook & eye closure to ensure long-lasting wear
~fully machine washable at 40 degrees
~the cups are dual sized that means they stretch and adapt to your changing shape. When choosing your size:
~for B & C cups, choose B
~for D & DD cups, choose D
~for E & F cups, choose E

name: Preggie Pop Drops (Regular & Plus)
description:
Morning sickness getting you down? Preggie drops are the perfect solution with just a little sweetness & essential oils to calm your tummy down. 

Sour Raspberry - Sour Lemon - Green Apple - Sour Tangerine

All Natural
Drug Free
Recommended by Healthcare Professionals
Developed by healthcare professionals to provide relief from morning sickness.

Preggie Pop Drops are effective due to our special formulation of essential oils, aromatherapy and a unique delivery method.
Preggie Pop Drops are also a great addition to your labor bag to help with dry mouth and provide a nice energy boost.

Ingredients:
Dried Cane Syrup, Corn Syrup, Citric Acid, Natural Flavors (made 
with essential oils) and Natural Colors.

Preggie Pops PLUS have 10 mg Vitamin B6 in addition to above ingredients & come in Sour Raspberry & Sour Lemon Combo.

Directions: 
For oral consumption only.  Allow to dissolve in mouth. Do not chew.

Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts.

21 lozenges per pack

options.name: PLUS w/Vitamin B6 Sour Combo - 21 drops

name: Rhythm for Life - The Prenatal Belly Dance Workout DVD by Suzanne Caesar
description:
For those of you looking for a more unique pregnancy workout, this is a perfect option. Endorsed by the March of Dimes, you won't be disappointed with the restorative workout Suzanne Caesar guides you through during your pregnancy and after. 

A fresh and contemporary prenatal workout to celebrate pregnancy while feeling strong and sexy. The Rhythm For Life DVD is a fun and fabulous support for moms-to-be to safely stay fit and feel good during pregnancy.

The Prenatal Belly Dance Workout DVD includes four segments:

Relax & Rejuvenate (15 min): Gentle stretching and yoga therapy to ease pregnancy discomforts and back tension, with emphasis on core strengthening.
Firm & Sexy (10 min): Counteract postural changes with upper body work, isolation exercises and dance moves to condition hips and thighs for an overall energy boost.
Latin Belly Dancy Fusion (20 min): A creative low impact routine that will keep you fit and feeling comfortable with your changing body.
Imagery & Meditation (3 min): Pelvic floor strengthening and guided imagery to relax and connect with your pregnant body and baby.

“This belly dancing routine not only promotes increased strength and balance, but it also helps reduce pregnancy discomfort and prepares your body for labor and delivery.”
-Pilates Style Magazine

name: C-Panty Starter Kit (2-pack High Waist & Classic Waist)
description:
If you had a c-section, these are a must buy!

A full c-section recovery system, the C-Panty Starter Kit includes the High Waist C-Section Recovery & Slimming Panty plus the Classic Brief Recovery Panty. 

The only product you will need after c-section - The C-Panty High Waist and Classic Brief panties are a complete recovery solution - no more scar creams, hospital panties, belly wraps or binders. C-Panty helps speed recovery and reduces scarring with its patented medical grade silicone panel inside the panty and customized compression to slim the post baby belly.

Heal faster - Patented interior silicone panel gives you professional incision care to minimize scarring and helps protect the delicate incision area. It also reduces itchiness, redness and restores skin to more natural texture.

Care for baby in comfort - Gentle compression supports weakened muscles and makes moving around after surgery easier and more comfortable. Convenient, pull on and go recovery panty for maximum comfort.

Slim down and shape up - C-Panty supports and slims even after you've recovered. It also helps flatten the c-section shelf under clothing. Just pull on and go until you are back to your pre-baby self!

Features:
-Built in silicone panel over the c-section incision area to help with incision scarring and its symptoms
-Moderate compression and post partum slimming
-Reduces swelling, scarring, sensitivity, tenderness
-Can be worn immediately after delivery

Fabric content: 92% nylon, 8% spandex. Machine washable as a delicate, line dry. Made in the USA.

*READ PACKAGE INSTRUCTIONS. LIKE ANY POST-OP CARE, GRADUAL USE MAY BE REQUIRED TO INCREASE TOLERATION.

name: Timi & Leslie Hart Diaper Bag
Belly Bandit Upsie Belly
description:
If you are looking for some belly & back support during pregnancy, this is a great solution from the makers of the Belly Bandit.

From Belly Bandit:

As your belly grows, you may find it uncomfortable and difficult to move with this sudden new weight. Upsie Belly™ provides immediate relief, making it easier to increase your range of motion and daily activity throughout your pregnancy. Featuring revolutionary SecureStretch™ materials that mold to your body with just the right amount of tension. This allows for strong support and a stable fit while the exclusive soft-front closure allows you to move freely, without digging or discomfort. Because your baby bump is all the matters, Upsie Belly™ is created from ultra soft bamboo made from viscose materials.
Instantly relieves pregnancy discomforts:

Minimizes stretch marks
Adds back and abdominal support
Helps relieve bladder discomfort
Increases circulation and blood flow
Eases sciatic, back and leg pain
Provides extra support to hips
Decreases varicose veins, hernias & hemorrhoids
12” of adjustability to grow with your belly
Aids in post hysterectomy recovery.
 
THIS BAND WORKS DOUBLE DUTY! Use it AFTER you deliver for added comfort and relief. Simply turn the belt around and fasten it in the back so the hot/cold pack lays over your healing belly.

name: Belly Bandit Original
description:
This is the Original Belly Bandit - still tried and true for post pregnancy support and aiding in getting your waistline back.

From Belly Bandit:

Our one-of-a-kind Original Belly Bandit® was created especially for a woman’s post pregnant body. This basic uncovered version is the ORIGINAL style that started the craze! We have created a customized medical grade garment specifically for the post pregnant women. Our ultimate Bandita belly binding elastic is 100% latex free and can be adjusted to fit around the belly, waist and hips to create the ultimate slimming result. Providing our unique powerful stretch and compress technology creates a garment geared to shrink your new shape.
The Original Belly Bandit® was made for the savvy no-nonsense mom on a belly busting mission. Simple, economical, effective and all together cute!
In order to receive maximum belly, waist and hip shrinking benefit you should wear this for 6-8 weeks post delivery.

name: Belly Bandit The B.F.F. in Bamboo
description:
We love the updated design from the makers of the original Belly Bandit. It is cut a little shorter (perfect for more petite customers) and we love the double tab making it easy to contour to your figure.

From Belly Bandit:

Our new revolutionary band is being described by many women as their “BFF”. While it will become your very best friend for 6-8 weeks after you deliver, the B.F.F. also stands for Body Formulated Fit. 

Utilizing a corset inspired construction and eco-friendly super-soft Promodal®, our premier band features many unique fit and fabrication advantages. This is an especially great fit for petite, shorter and short-waisted women.  Six uniquely shaped panels hug your curves in comfort while offering 2 more inches of Velcro. Our patent pending design creates the ability for mom to have two different panels of compression that simultaneously cinch the waist, hips and belly and conform to your body to create a natural silhouette – because we are all not built the same. 

As a fabric blend that comes directly from nature, Promodal® offers optimum moisture management, smooth fiber structure to help avoid skin irritations, and a reduced growth of bacteria, to name a few. The B.F.F. has been created and shaped just like a woman’s body…curvy! It is high recommended for short and shorter waisted women. With all this being united to make the B.F.F., we are making both Mother and Mother Earth very happy.

name: Tracy Anderson Method Post-Pregnancy Workout DVD
description:
Looking for a great workout post-pregnancy to reconnect with your pre-pregnancy body and get even stronger and more toned?

From Tracy:

This video is quite personal to me as I am a mom who gained 60 pounds during my pregnancy. Through this experience, I discovered that there is a way to get your body back after babies, and you have to start as soon as your doctor says it’s ok. Your entire body needs to reconnect, and the muscular structure needs to be pulled back together.

If you dedicate yourself to this video, you will look better than before pregnancy. It is so important to get your body in great shape and do it quickly. With having a new baby it's easy to forget about yourself, but if you don't feel good you're not helping anyone. 

This video will pull the muscles back together, and the dance aerobics will help you shed the weight.

Just a reminder that you should not start working out post-pregnancy until your doctor gives you the okay.

Formatted to play on all DVD players.

name: Mama Glow: A Hip Lifestyle Guide to Your Fabulous Abundant Pregnancy by Latham Thomas
description:
In Mama Glow, Latham Thomas shares her holistic approach to pregnancy, which she has used to educate, empower, and inspire her clients to look and feel their most radiant. As the Mama Glowmaven, Latham has touched the lives of hundreds of women including celebrities who want to experience a healthy, balanced, and fabulous pregnancy. 

Mama Glow is a comprehensive wellness plan containing dietary and lifestyle advice that helps optimize your glow. Using plant-based nutrition (or "Glow Foods"), journaling, yoga, affirmations, visualizations, and other tools, Mama Glow offers a unique system to help you develop an authentic relationship with your changing body, boost energy levels and lift moods, combat common ailments like morning sickness, prepare for an easier delivery, and achieve radiant skin, nails, hair, and a vibrant overall aura. In other words, the "Mama Glow."

In this book, Latham Thomas takes you through every stage of pregnancy as your certified "glow-pilot," giving you practical advice and action steps to make your journey a joyful and vibrant experience. Beginning with Wellness B.C. ("Before Child"), Latham shows you how to make room for your pregnancy, assess your current diet, banish toxic habits, and incorporate yoga and contemplative practices into your life. Next you'll focus on the first trimester, when your body starts to change-along with all the common discomforts she'll show you how to alleviate. Section three looks at the second trimester, with tips for finding a health-care provider for your baby, reducing stress, creating healthy meals for you and your "bun," and Glow Potion beauty essentials. You'll also learn to flow, practice mindfulness affirmations, and explore sex and birth. In section four, she focuses on the final trimester: preparing for birth, labor coaches, birth plans, comfortable yoga postures, and an explanation of the anatomy of labor and birth. Ending with the postpartum section, Latham guides you back to your pre-baby body and gives tips for breastfeeding, optimal nutrition as a new mom, and stepping into the new you-navigating motherhood.

Mama Glow is a must-have guide for a balanced lifestyle that will have you feeling and looking your most radiant for the next nine months-and beyond.

Publisher Hay House
Publication Date October 2012
ISBN	 978-1-4019-3920-5

Buy any book and your order ships for free!

name: One Hot Mama: The Guide to Getting Your Mind and Body Back After Baby by Erin Cox
description:
After giving birth, even the most confident, fit, and spiritually centered women can feel depressed, overwhelmed by the responsibilities of motherhood, and disheartened by their plump postpartum bodies. 

Erin Cox knows exactly how they feel. She wrote One Hot Mama as a comprehensive guide to support, nurture, and steer women through a fun and completely doable process to lose unwanted pregnancy pounds and create an exceptional life. Erin understands that weight loss is an emotional process, and new mothers need to feel empowered and supported to make healthy lifestyle changes. New moms don't have the time or energy to count calories, but rather need guidelines and easy-to-implement suggestions on how to improve their diet and exercise routines.

Using a realistic approach that has proven to be effective, mothers will be encouraged to make positive life changes that will encourage weight loss, positive thinking, and self-love. Women who read this book will not only feel empowered and invigorated to get their bodies back in shape, but the positive changes will impact every single aspect of life-allowing them to live a joyous and fulfilled life as a woman and mother, even emerging happier and healthier than before getting pregnant!

Softcover
Publisher Hay House
Publication Date November 2012
ISBN	 978-1-4019-3962-5

Buy any book and get free shipping on your whole order.

name: Tracy Anderson: The Pregnancy Project
description:
We will have this DVD set back in very soon, so please check bac or e-mail us at shop@bumpbrooklyn.com to reserve it.

While pregnant with her son 13 years ago, Tracy gained over 60 pounds. It was this significant weight gain, along with a weight gain that Tracy experienced while studying dance, which propelled her to research and develop the Tracy Anderson Method. After announcing her second pregnancy in 2012, Tracy Anderson began production on a series of pregnancy workout DVDs to serve as a guide for women throughout their pregnancy.

Similar to Tracy’s successful Metamorphosis DVDs, this series contains many more tools than just the workouts. The series contains nine different workouts, one workout focused on each month of pregnancy, which Tracy filmed in real time. In addition to the workouts, the series contains interviews with doctors, mothers, Tracy’s clients, and various experts on pregnancy. The advice from these experts also include testimonials from Tracy’s clients that have been able to attribute their post-pregnancy bodies to Tracy’s method.

The Pregnancy Project is designed to be a guide for expectant parents and covers everything from nutrition, to fitness, to the leading studies on pregnancy. Tracy already has a tremendously successful post-pregnancy workout DVD, with over 1 million copies sold, and this project is designed to be a much more comprehensive tool for women at all stages of pregnancy and motherhood.

A portion of sales from this dvd will benefit www.everymothercounts.org. Please check it out if you haven't heard of it.

Formatted to play universally & worldwide.

name: 9 Fashion Baco Trousers
description:
An extremely fashionable maternity trousers with a narrow legs from 9 fashion. On the sides knitwear insets that adapts the trousers to the growing tummy.  May by zipped or unzipped at the ankle.

Available in black or brown.

Composition: viscose 60%, polyester 37%, elastane 3%

Originally $92

name: Belly Button Phyllis Coat
description:
Unfortunately, we just found out we will not be receiving this jacket this winter. So sad - hopefully we'll have it for your pregnant friends next year!

A wonderful multi-functional warm down jacket from Belly Button..  The highlight is the removable center panel that is zipped in during pregnancy and is easily removed afterwards to extend the life of this great jacket.

Runs slim but generally true to size. 

Water Resistant Fabric
Removable Faux Fur Trim

name: Boob Stretch Cords
description:
Nothing is cozier when the weather gets cold than a pair of cords.  We love this super soft slim leg option from Boob. Low cut front with adjustable elastic inside waistband and soft fold-able jersey panel. Waistband with loops. The jeans grow with the belly and have a comfortable fit throughout pregnancy. 98% cotton and 2% elastane. Machine washable, 40°. 

These cords run generous, so we suggest ordering down one size.

Originally $128

name: Sono Vaso Cali Tank Dress
description:
Stripes are eternally popular at Bump and we just love the color combination of this dress, not to mention the price!  Easy to layer when the weather cools down, this is just a great, fun and easy to wear dress.  Cotton/spandex blend.

Originally $52

name: Boba Air Baby Carrier
description:
This in an ingenious baby carrier from Colorado based company Boba and creators of our favorite baby carrier, the 3G. For parents on the go, this easily portable carrier is the perfect solution. It zips into its own little bag making it easy to throw into your diaper bag or back pack. 

Great for babies and toddlers when you are out on the town and need an carrying solution for shorter periods of time.  It won't be your only carrier, but it will become a go to carrier as your child gets older and spends more time walking and running than being carried.

Holds up to 30 pounds as a front carrier and 45 pounds as a back carrier (just for reference, my tall, though skinny 6 year old weighs 42 pounds) so you will be able to use it for a while!

Features many of the same great options as their 3G carrier - the hood, easily adjustable straps, zip pocket. 

Sorry, we cannot ship Boba Products Internationally.

name: Clover Canyon Circle Forest Blouse
description:
Another great print from California based Clover Canyon. This contemporary blouse is great over a growing belly and perfect post-pregnancy with easy lift up nursing access. 

It is a sheer jersey fabric so we suggest a camisole under it - the Everyday Cami from Ingrid & Isabel is the perfect solution. 

100% Polyester Jersey
Dry Clean Only

Original $214

name: Paige Denim Verdugo Ultra Skinny Cord
description:
We have a soft spot for cords and these skinny baby cords from Paige Denim are pretty hard to resist. Perfect for fall and winter days when you want something cozy but more structured than a legging. You will live in these.

A mid rise, super stretch ultra skinny that hugs the leg down to the leg opening. This jean has been rescaled and specially tailored to provide fashion and comfort throughout pregnancy.

Rise: 8 1/8"
Inseam: 30"
Leg Opening: 10 1/4"

97% Cotton / 3% Spandex

We just received our first shipment from Lilac Maternity. We love the fresh styles and fun prints. 

This top is a perfect example and great for the start of fall. The tie neck detail and cross-over front add just a little flair (and yes, you can nurse in it post-pregnancy). It has great ruched detail on the sides and back. 

And best of all, it will satisfy your animal print cravings..

ORIGINALLY $92


Fits true to size
Rayon/Spandex Blend
Gentle Wash/Dry Flat

Made in USA

description:
This is a great dress from Parisian line En Sainte for a slim pregnant woman looking for something sexy yet versatile. The fabric has a subtle stretch so it will hug your curves. 

Skirt has a slight flair and hits right at the knee. This dress will fit most women through second trimester and then works great as a transition dress (with untie nursing access) post pregnancy.

Runs small so we suggest ordering up 1-2 sizes.

Size 40 is pictured on mannequin.

Original $195

name: Jellystone Fiesta Bangle
description: Brand new at Bump we love Jellystone Designs fashionable and functional jewelry.  The entire line is free from BPA, Phthalates and PVC with a fabulous soft-feel and texture. description:
This is a great supportive & slightly plunging Nursing Bra from Melinda G. It subtly contours curves with no pads.

Smooth, seamless, deep cleavage cups are made of a wonderful spacer fabric for subtle enhancement. Bra features their popular under-the-breast channeling for the support of a wire without the wire. Convenient one-handed clips on the cups are very easy to use. Back hooks and eyes accomodate changing postnatal figures. Deep black or fabulous nude.

LYCRA® spandex.

name: Boba Baby Wrap (more colors & prints)
description:
We love the soft stretchy fabric which makes the Boba Baby Wrap easy to use and fit snuggly but not too tight.

The Boba Baby Wrap is the ideal carrier for babies from birth until around 18 months, free of buckles, straps or snaps! Simply tie the material snug against your body and achieve a perfect fit every time – perfect for beginners and advance babywearers alike.

Features:

95% cotton 5% spandex (high quality French Terry material)
Front & infant hold
Supports up to 35lbs
Hands-free Availability
Ideal for breastfeeding
Machine washable

name: Boba 3G Baby Carrier - ON SALE!
description:
We are thrilled to have this carrier at Bump. We have tried a lot of carriers, and without question this is our favorite. Suitable for a newborn all the way through toddler. It has great features, is easy to use and adjust from one person to another, and most of all is comfortable. You will love your Boba 3G Carrier. 

If you prefer a wrap option, we also have the Boba Wrap.

Boba is a Soft Structured Carrier (SSC) that is intended for babies and children between 7-45lbs. Boba offers several innovative features not seen on other carriers:

The foot straps attached to the waist belt keep older children comfortable while enabling a healthy sitting position. The footstraps not only give tired little legs a rest, but support the legs in a flexed abducted (froglike) position which naturally tilts the pelvis, fills out the hip sockets and aligns the spine.

The new infant conversion option allows you to use the Boba Carrier 3G with babies over 7lbs. The best part is that there is absolutely no insert or accessory needed! Simply follow the instruction booklet included with your Boba Carrier to learn how to use the new Boba Carrier 3G for your newborn.

Features:
100% Cotton
Front and back carry options
Removable sleeping hood
Adjustable sleeping hood, adjusting in length to fit growing babies
Zipper pouch may be used to store your hood when not in use
Comfortably fits heights 5’0” – 6’3”
Waistband range: 25” – 58”
Additional adjustments for easier fit & breastfeeding
Patent-pending removable foot straps
Elastic bands neatly roll up straps
Shoulder strap holders keep purses and diaper bags in place
Easily adjustable chest strap
Uniquely designed to “hug” your child
Converts to an infant carrier without an insert
Extra head support adjustments for infants
Body of carrier rises 2-3” higher than other brands
Multiple pockets for on-the-go storage
High quality military grade buckles

Sorry, we cannot ship Boba Products Internationally.

description:
The Bella Materna Bra has been our favorite best selling bra season after season and now it is even better. With its simple no-clip, pull over design, it makes it one of the most comfortable and easy to wear bras we have tried - also our favorite option during pregnancy. 

The hotly anticipated revinvention of our best-selling nursing bra has finally arrived! The NEW Padded Anytime bralet provides smoothing coverage and comfortable support for your last trimester into nursing. S,M,L,XL,XXL easy  sizing accommodates your fluctuating size. Pull aside nursing access is quick and easy. 

Features include:

name: The Atlas 2-in-1 Pregnancy Band
description:
We love this all in 1 pregnancy band from the company that created the Cinch band. It has a belly support feature to give you support during pregnancy and a smooth post pregnancy tummy band - easy to adjust and swap out with simple velcro tabs.

Conventional wisdom may dictate that once you bear a child, all hope of getting your old body back is gone.  The Band Specialist believes it’s about time that old wives’ tale was rewritten. To that end, they’ve just unveiled a new product, the Atlas™. Designed specifically for wear during the third trimester and the 6 weeks post baby and beyond, the 2-in-1 Atlas™ tummy band helps new moms regain their pre-pregnancy physique and confidence faster.

Some of the pre- and post-pregnancy perks include:
•    Less back pain, fatique, swelling and stretch marks
•    Prevention of spine curvature, thereby creating more space  for the fetus to grow
•    Improved circulation to the legs, thereby preventing varicose veins
•    Less nerve impingement
•    Freer movement
•    Reduction in tension headaches
•    Cold/warm back insert that reduces the need for pain medication and
•    Abdominal support & Tone

Sizing is based on PRE-PREGNANCY waist measurements
FABRIC; 30% Nylon, 45% Polyester, 25% Spandex

Style # AABCOMBO28

Please not this set DOES NOT include the Cold/Warm Compresses.

One size fits most

Cold Wash Gentle Cycle

mid bump band for a comfortable fit

name: Ingrid & Isabel Everyday BellaBand
description:
Black BellaBands are on back order until mid-October.

This is an essential for any pregnant woman looking to extend the life of your existing pants and skirts. We wish we had invented it. We loved the original band and the newer version is even greater cut a little longer and featuring a silicone band around the bottom to stick to your pants or skirt, it doesn't get much better than this.

Bellaband is a carefully constructed essential designed to hold up unbuttoned waistbands, loose maternity wear and garments that slip down around a late-pregnancy belly. Spend less time thinking about your pants and enjoy flaunting your belly. Now featuring a stay-put silicone strip for more hold and added length for extra coverage.

description:

We sell this style quickly but get in back in stock almost as fast so if you don't see the color you are looking for check back soon and we should have it!

name: Bamboob-Ease Soothing Therapy Pillows from Bamboobies
description:
Bamboob-ease Soothing Therapy Pillows combine the softness of Bamboobies with warming and cooling relief with an all natural, gel-free product.  Each pillow has one side made out of super-soft 100% bamboo fleece and one side of equally soft bamboo and organic cotton jersey to provide you a choice of two different sides for softness and temperature control.  In the middle are flax seeds.  The pillows can be heated in the microwave or cooled in the freezer to provide warming or cooling relief from the common discomforts of breastfeeding.

Gentle warmth opens clogged ducts and increases milk production.

Therapeutic cooling soothes sore new mama nipples and breasts.

Each package includes one pair of Bamboob-ease Soothing Therapy Pillows.  Made in the USA from imported fabrics.  To clean, gently wipe clean with damp cloth and air dry.  DO NOT GET WET.  Do not machine wash or dry.

Come with a pair regular bamboobies nursing pads.

description:

name: Amalou Regime - Reveal, Prime, Moisturize & Restore
description:
Designed specifically for use during pregnancy this 4 step program by Amalou Skin™ is designed to be used together, to care for your face without depleting moisture, while simultaneously working to reduce the appearance of troubled skin. Our products are screened for ingredient safety and dermatologist-tested. Amalou Skin uses no benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid, retinoids or other vitamin A derivatives. All products are free of parabens, phlalates, sulfates, fragrance, or risky natural ingredients. So you can have peace of mind while maintaining your outer – and inner – beauty. 

Step 1: 
Cleanse and exfoliate with Reveal Exfoliating Face Wash.

Step 2: 
Restore ph balance and infuse skin with antioxidants with Prime Detoxifying Tonic.

Step 3: 
Hydrate without irritating and fight signs of aging with peptide-infused Glow Balancing Moisturizer.

Step 4: 
Reprogram skin at night and help fight blemishes with Restore Night Treatment.

name: Amalou Restore Night Treatment
description:
Designed by Amalou specifically for use during pregnancy, this night treatment with azelaic acid and hydrogen peroxide is designed to reprogram skin at night with this light, nourishing blend of ingredients. Azelaic acid and hydrogen peroxide help fight blemish-causing bacteria while also helping to improve the appearance of blemishes and discoloration. Skin is left feeling soft and looking even. 

Designed for use after cleansing with REVEAL Wash and PRIME Tonic. Massage 1-2 pumps into face and neck as needed. Let product sink into skin for approximately 3-5 minutes before rubbing in any excess.

Dermatologist and allergy tested. Safe for sensitive skin. Avoid eyebrows and hairline. For external use only. Stop use and consult physician if rash, irritation, or redness develops. Keep out of the reach of children.

Contains no vitamin A derivatives, salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide. Contains no: parabens; sulfates; synthetic dyes; synthetic fragrances; petrochemicals; phthalates; No BPA in Packaging. 
INGREDIENT LISTING: 

Aqua (Deionized Water),Caprilyic/Capric Triglycerides, Hydrogen Peroxide, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 80, Propanediol, Azelaic Acid, Disodium Phosphate

name: Amalou Glow Balancing Moisturizer
description:
This balancing non-irritating moisturizer designed specifically for use during pregnancy with peptides, tea tree oil and azelaic acid was created to hydrate without agitating troubled skin or clogging pores. Azelaic acid helps reduce the appearance of blemishes and discoloration. Tea tree oil helps clarify skin with anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory properties. Peptides help reduce signs of aging. Skin is left perfectly balanced – hydrated, but not oily. 

Instructions: 

Recommended for use after cleansing with REVEAL Wash and PRIME Tonic. Massage into face and neck. Follow with your choice of SPF for complete daytime protection (we recommend powder SPF for blemished skin).

Dermatologist and allergy tested. Safe for sensitive skin. For external use only. Stop use and consult physician if rash, irritation, or redness develops. Keep out of the reach of children.

Contains no vitamin A derivatives, salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide. Contains no: parabens; sulfates; synthetic dyes; synthetic fragrances; petrochemicals; phthalates; No BPA in Packaging.

name: Amalou Prime Detoxifying Tonic
description:
This alcohol-free toner designed specifically for use during pregnancy with natural antiseptics, antioxidants, and azelaic acid works to complete the cleansing process with nourishing ingredients that help balance skin. The witch hazel and chamomile work to calm skin and reduce irritation, while tea tree oil and thyme are natural antiseptics. Left behind is a layer of green tea and grape seed extract – natural antioxidants that help detoxify skin and fight free radicals – and azelaic acid, which helps diminish the appearance of blemishes, large pores and discoloration. 

Instructions: 

Use morning and night after cleansing with REVEAL Exfoliating Wash. Spray a small amount onto dry cloth or cotton swab to gently wipe on face and neck. Follow with GLOW Balancing Moisturizer or RESTORE Night Treatment.

Dermatologist and allergy tested. Safe for sensitive skin. For external use only. Stop use and consult physician if rash, irritation, or redness develops. Keep out of the reach of children.

Contains no vitamin A derivatives, salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide. Contains no: parabens; sulfates; synthetic dyes; synthetic fragrances; petrochemicals; phthalates; No BPA in Packaging

name: Amalou Reveal Gentle Exfoliating Facial Wash
description:
This gentle exfoliating wash from Amalou which is design specifically for use during pregnancy with tea tree oil, chamomile, and azelaic acid provides a deep clean without irritating skin. Azelaic acid helps fight bacteria and refine pores while also helping to even skin tone. Tea tree oil is a natural anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory agent. Chamomile soothes and relaxes stresses. Skin is left looking calm and clean. 
Instructions: 

Use morning and night. Apply to wet face, gently massaging into skin with a circular motion. Do not scrub. Rinse with warm water. Follow with PRIME Tonic and GLOW Balancing Moisturizer or RESTORE Night Treatment.

Dermatologist and allergy tested. Safe for sensitive skin. For external use only. Stop use and consult physician if rash, irritation, or redness develops. Keep out of the reach of children.

Contains no vitamin A derivatives, salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide. Contains no: parabens; sulfates; synthetic dyes; synthetic fragrances; petrochemicals; phthalates; No BPA in Packaging.

name: Cold Snap from Hatch Things
description:
We'll have our new cold snaps in later this week at a new lower price of $99!

We are so excited to be one of the first stores to be carrying Cold Snap from Hatch Things, an ingenious universal panel that can be attached to your favorite winter coat to cover you and your baby snugly.  

Designed by a Brooklyn artist and mother the Cold Snap has the following features:

* Waterproof
* Fleece-lined
* Universal cover clips securely onto any coat
* Can be used with any front facing carrier
* Comes with a removable and reversible good

This great carrier cover will work for dad just as well as mom!

description:
Unfortunately we will not have new stock in the M Coat until early to mid-January.

We are super excited to have this coat back in stock at Bump just in time for cold winter days that are already here. 

The M Coat is a unique, convertible 3-in-1 jacket that goes from being a fashionable Maternity coat; to a hip Mama coat; and back to a regular fitting Myself coat.

The coat runs a little small through the bust so we suggest ordering up if you are bustier (remember if you want to wear it post baby, you will not be using the panel and need to make sure to be able to zip it up).

Includes the following features:

~Detachable hood
~Detachable faux fur trim
~Teflon treated outer fabric to resist water/stains
~Interior zippered pocket for valuables
~Multi-purpose front panel
~Removable front V-panel for normal fashionable wearing
~Adjustable drawstring in panel to cinch under belly or    additional baby support
~Oversized exterior pockets
~Zippered cuffs for adjustable length
~Alternate belt uses to adjust for snugness (tied in front/behind)
~"Freshness Assurance": Down washed 15 times and treated with an antibacterial sanitizer
~Machine Washable

Insulated with Pure Canadian Down. 
Manufactured by Canadian Spirit Downwear in Canada.

If we don't have the color or size in stock that you would like please e-mail us at shop@bumpbrooklyn.com and we'll let you know when we have a new shipment.

name: Preggers Maternity Compression Tights (more colors)
description:
A fall & winter staple for every pregnant mama. These tights feature light gradual compression to improve circulation and most important look and feel great on. 

Info from Preggers:

Gradient Compression Hosiery is used to Improve Circulation, Prevent Swelling and Energize Tired Legs and Feet

10-15mmHg* Gradient Compression (*The mean compression for average ankle size.)

True gradient compression delivers a controlled amount of pressure greatest at the ankle and gradually decreases towards the top of the stocking to promote better blood flow. 

Unique top that will fit during all stages of pregnancy. Our built-in tummy support panel provides a sense of stability for active mommas and can be worn folded under belly during mid to end of pregnancy or unfolded to cover belly during the early months. 

Super soft material is breathable and provides shaping support. 

Toe is reinforced for durability and rounded for a comfortable fit. 

Micro-Cool® process creates a wicking effect so moisture evaporates from the skin quickly providing a comfortable coolness. 

Smooth seams that will not dig into your tummy or show under clothes. 

Made in USA

name: Fjällräven Luhkka Cape
description:
We were super excited to find this all weather cape from Fjällräven - a Swedish line with a tried and true history of making outer wear for harsh climates. This is perfect outer layer for just about anything fall or winter brings your way and it will cover a bump of any size. 

From Fjällräven:
The Luhkka Cape in lightly insulated G-1000 provides shelter against rain, snow, sleet and bitter winds. The cape is inspired by a traditional Sami garment and can be used both as a reinforcement layer on cold winter days, and on its own during the autumn and spring. 

The cape has a fixed, adjustable hood with detachable synthetic fur trim and a reflector in the back. There is a mid-length zipper in the front that makes it easy to put on and take off. The cape has a breast pocket and a large kangaroo pocket that can be accessed from both the inside and the outside of the garment.

We definitely think it is a Bump essential this winter. Runs generous, so order 1 size down. 

Originally $299

name: Basq Bounce Back Aromacology Spa Kit
description:
Bounce Back Spa Kit is the perfect head-to-toe lift! Strengthen and firm in 2 steps, polish then nourish. Soothe swelling and fight fatigue with cooling eye gel and energizing lotion. Perfect during or post pregnancy or weight loss, and for an overall lift. This kit has all you need for gorgeous skin at tremendous value. Essential oils and plant extracts have powerful benefits for the body while their scents affect mood, energy level and overall health. Start with Citrus Sugar Body polish - the first step to toned skin. Massage into skin to prevent spongey areas from forming and settling in while the toning oils and butters strengthen and refortify skin. Follow with Resilient Body Toning Oil, packed with Essential Fatty Acids that actually work with your skin for deep, intense conditioning. Zap eye area puffiness and the appearance of fine lines with the cooling, refreshing eye treatment of our Cucumber Tea Eye Gel. Then for an overall fatique buster - use Energizing Body Lotion all over body. Revitalizes your body and mind for a refreshed feel.

The Spa Kit includes: (1) 4 oz jar of Citrus Sugar Body Polish, (2) 0.5 oz bottles of Resilient Body Oil, (1) 5 oz tube of Energizing Body Lotion, (1) 0.5 oz jar of Cucumber Tea Eye Gel.

name: Basq Resilient Body Oil
description:
Gold Standard of Stretch Mark Oils

Quite simply, nothing nourishes skin like essential fatty acid rich oils. One of our Top Sellers for the prevention and repair of stretch marks, basq Resilient Body Oil blends the highest quality, skin nurturing oils available to protect you through the big stretch and beyond. Oils fuel the skin's natural hydration and healing process in the dermis layer of skin where stretch marks form. Hazelnut, Sweet Almond, Wheat Germ, Grapeseed, Rosehip, and Eucalyptus oils, along with Vitamin E - all super rich in Essential Fatty Acids - strengthen skin in a way lotions can't. Absolutely NO GREASINESS - remember you want the oil deep within skin - not sitting on top! So while you're left with soft, nourished skin - there is no heavy residue. You'll never go back to a lotion!

Early in your pregnancy and not yet fully feeling the stretch? This oil is the perfect way to start skin protection improve elasticity and resiliency all over body early in pregnancy and throughout the nine month stretch. As your skin changes, it may feel taut, dry and itch all over - an oil spreads easily for full coverage. If you never tried an oil - now it the time and this is the blend.

Enjoy the invigorating scent for an everyday lift. All Natural, Non greasy, Non staining formula.

All basq products are rigorously Clinically Tested for ZERO Skin Allergy and Irritancy. The line is Paraben, Phlthlate and Animal Testing Free.

basq resilient Body Oil is an editor favorite profiled in countless Best of Beauty guides including Pregnancy, W, OK!, Pregnancy and New Born, Child, Organic Spa, Celebrity Babies, Parents Expecting, Gloss plus several international publications.

name: Mambino Organics bun in the oven™ 9 month journey pack
description:
Taking care of your baby starts with taking care of YOU. You wouldn't dream of putting harsh chemicals on your baby's skin, so why would you put them on yours, especially when you're pregnant? Packed with skin loving essentials, from head to toe, to keep your skin healthy, smooth and stretch mark free. Each product feels amazing and smells delicious! Then just sit back, relax and enjoy the journey.


This fabulous sample pack worth $55 includes:

- oh baby! belly butter™ (1.5 oz / 43 g) - A rich, luxurious blend of nature's most nourishing and healing botanicals.
      What happens: Softens the appearance of old and prevents new stretch marks.

- youth glow™ omega face complex (.13 oz / 4 ml) - A light weight, fast absorbing oil, rich in essential fatty acids and natural antioxidants.
      What happens: Awakens the skin to radiant, youthful glow

- moisture me™ body toning oil (2 oz / 60ml) - A light refreshing body toning oil.
      What happens: Boosts collagen production, firming trouble spots in the stomach, decollete, arms and legs.

- mandarin creme™ organic body wash (2oz / 60 ml) This clarifying organic body wash lathers up gently, without stripping the skin's protective oils (no sulfates or parabans).
      What happens: Clarifies and brightens skin with saponified oils of olive & coconut and red mandarin.

- kissable lips™ (.25 oz / 7 g) This rich balm deeply moisturizes, renews and protects dry and chapped lips, without causing dependency.
What happens: Keeps lips moist and supple.

name: Mambino Organics Calendula Nursing Balm™
description:
Moms love the calendula nursing balm because you don't have to wash it off before nursing your baby. A must-have during the first months of breastfeeding when your nipples can feel a bit sore. Your baby is learning to breastfeed too. Instantly conditions and soothes painful irritations and helps heal chapped nipples, by making them more supple and resilient. Unscented, lanolin-free and 100% natural.

Benefits:

- Calendula infused oil- regenerates torn skin tissue
- Olive oil- hydrates and soothes skin
- Plantain infused oil- relieves skin irritations and inflammation

name: Mambino Organics little bottoms™ baby ointment
description:
We love Mambino's products for moms, so why not pamper your babe as well. 

The little bottoms baby ointment is perfect for sensitive skin. It contains soothing oats, calendula and apricot oil. 

A baby's skin is delicate, and this is particularly true around the nappy area. This all-natural ointment is specially formulated for sensitive skin that suffers breakouts and prickly heat, without affecting the skin's natural breathing. It helps keep baby dry and comfortable, by creating a moisture repellent barrier. Also great for cradle cap and minor rashes, scrapes and burns; zinc and lanolin free. Unscented and cloth diaper safe (for prolonged life of cloth diapers recommend to use with a sterile gauze over the ointment).

Benefits:

- Colloidal Oatmeal - soothes and promotes skin healing
- Apricot oil - excellent softening and moisturizing properties
- Calendula infused oil - regenerates damaged skin tissue
- Coconut oil - anti-inflammatory and anti-fungal benefits

name: Mama Spanx by Sara Blakely - In Store Only
description:
Mama Spanx - Tummy to Toes Full Length "Mama Hose" - as the package says, they deliver "a cradle of comfort and flawless legs for expecting moms."

Mama Spanx provide under belly and lower back support. 
Ultra sheer look with added strength. 
Invisible reinforced toe.

This style is available at our Brooklyn Boutique.

name: Noppies Cotton Blend Maternity Tights
description:
A great fall & winter maternity staple. These tights are soft and comfortable, providing just the right amount of thickness to keep you warm on a cold day.

Machine wash warm, tumble dry low.

73% Cotton
24% Polyamide/Nylon
3% Elastane/Spandex
Style # 93003

All hosiery are final sale.

name: Ripe Opaque Maternity Tights
description:
These are a great maternity staple that we hope to have back in stock soon.

These are the perfect all-round opaque maternity tight. They have a wide tummy panel that covers your bump without feeling too tight.

They have a reinforced toe for durability and should last your whole pregnancy.

- Nylon/elastane/cotton; hand wash.
- By Ripe - made in Australia.
- Style # W8104
- All hosiery are final sale.

name: Bamboobies - Organic Nursing Pads Multi Packs
description:
These great multi packs should cover you for nursing. 

The 4 pack contains 3 pairs of the Bamboobies heart shaped Regular nursing pads (1 black/white, 1 hot pink/white, 1 pale pink/white) and 1 pair of the Overnights.

The 6 Pack contains 6 Pairs of the Regular heart shaped pads - 2 pairs of each color.

No Leaks, No Lines, No Chafing! Bamboobies Organic Nursing Pads are supersoft and feel like "cashmere sweaters." They are made of certified organic bamboo and cotton velour that soothes chafed nipples. 

- Ultra absorbent hemp core disperses and locks milk
- Milk-proof outer layer prevents leaks
- Ultra thin, high performance eco-fabrics
- Not wrinkly or crinkly
- Washable

Overnight pads are thicker and made from a more absorbent Bamboo fleece with an interior hemp & cotton layer

name: Bamboobies - 2 Pair Overnight Bamboo Nursing Pads
description:
All natural, Ultra Soft and Extra Absorbent for overnight use! Thicker and more absorbent than regular Bamboobies nursing pads for night-time use. Overnights are for the first weeks of breastfeeding before your milk supply is regulated, and for heavier leaking overnight and early morning.

  - Super-soft fleece soothes chafed nipples
  - Anti-microbrial bamboo may help prevent breast infection
  - Bamboo and hemp fabric absorb 4X more milk than cotton
  - Extra large to prevent leaking while you sleep
  - Washable
  - Contains Two Pairs

name: Maternal America Skinny Jean
description:
This great skinny jean from Maternal America is one of our best selling jeans.  The fit, comfort and price make for a great combination.  If you’re ‘on the fence’ about getting a skinny jean, we have found that this jean is a great option.  Customers rave about how comfortable they are.

description:
This a great straight leg jean from J Brand.  The sophisticated timeless cut makes them incredibly versatile and wearable. They have added soft elastic panels on each side of the waistband for room to grow with each month. The front rise is cut below the belly and is higher in the back rise than a regular jean. The elastic panels are also great for getting back into style and shape after giving birth.

description:
We have a hard time keeping these in stock.

These luxurious, ultra-soft knit leggings stretch to gently hug your hips, legs and belly. The high seamless waistband gives full belly coverage and room to grow while the legs are cut long for year-round wear. 

Made with your changing body in mind, you can wear the waistband folded at the waistline in early pregnancy, up high and over your belly for full coverage as you grow, and, when it's more comfortable, folded around the lower hips for under-the-belly support in your last weeks of pregnancy. Also great for body support after baby arrives.

Size 1 - pre-pregnancy size 0-8
Size 2 - pre-pregnancy size 10-14
Size 3/4 - pre-pregnancy size 16+

Ingrid & Isabel Style # 1116

100% cotton

Style # M778

name: Canopy Verde Dewberry Bag
description:
We love this non-diaper bag from Canopy Verde.  It has many compartments that are perfect for carrying all that your baby needs and it will transition perfectly into your everyday life when not with your baby.  Made from organic cotton, this bag is also earth friendly.  What's not to love about it!

name: Basq Stretch Mark Butter
description:
Although Basq's Stretch Mark Cream is triple strength it certainly does not feel heavy or greasy.  Blended with Shea Butter and Jojoba, it is delicately scented with aromatic oils and easily absorbed.  It contains Darutoside and Algisium C, which are powerful ingredients that combat stretch marks, promote resiliency, strengthen and nourish skin.  

Clinically Tested for No Skin Irritancy or Allergy. Safe to use during pregnancy and nursing.  Paraben, Phthalate and Animal Testing Free.

name: Mambino Organics Oh Baby!™ Belly Butter
description:
This rich, luxurious blend of nature's most nourishing and healing botanicals, softens the appearance of old and prevents new stretch marks. Restores elasticity and hydration, while soothing dry, itchy skin. A hint of pure lavender and red mandarin refresh and rejuvenate your senses. After childbirth, continue use to aid in the rebound of the belly.

 *  Shea butter- strengthens and firms connective tissue
 * Mango butter- protects and moisturizes
 * Cocoa butter- softens and smoothes skin
 * Calendula infused oil - regenerates torn skin tissue
 * Rosehip oil - rich in vitamin C, promotes skin healing

name: Storksak Emily Nylon Diaper Bag
description:
It's hard to tell that this this soft nylon bag is actually a diaper bag!  Beautifully designed with an adjustable shoulder strap with gold hardware and contrast stitching.   Dual side zip thermo-insulated bottle pockets keep fluids warm/cool for up to 4 hours (time will vary depending on external temperature). It also includes a padded changing mat, detachable inner bag for wipes or make-up, a mobile pocket, and multiple inner pockets to store you and your child's items. Wipe clean lining.

Dimensions
H12.5" W15.5" D6"

name: Dote 9th Street Nursing Dress
description:
This elegant cap sleeved dress has a double ruffle hem and back tie. Nursing access via the top layer at the empire band to access nursing openings underneath.  So simple and so beautiful.

This dress can also easily be worn during pregnancy. 

37" from shoulder to hem.  Rayon spandex

name: Belly Bandit Bamboo
description:
The best selling eco-friendly Bamboo Belly Bandit®  is inherently antibacterial*; moisture wicking*, and three times more durable than cotton. Bamboo is a sustainable crop that requires no pesticides; fungicides; herbicides, or additional water. Fabric made from Bamboo is one of the softest; all natural; and GREENEST fibers around. Being earth-friendly never felt so good! The Bamboo Belly Bandit®  is made for the "green" mom who spares no expense for the environment, or her comfort. Ecological; smart; unbeaten, and all together our comfy coziest!

The Belly Bandit is best worn within 6 weeks of delivering and is especially supportive if you've delivered your baby via c-section.
If you are planning to wear your belly bandit next to your skin, this is definitely the softest option. 

The sizing chart is best used during the 8th month of pregnancy or after you've given birth.  For sizing tips please call us at: 718 638 1960.

name: C-Panty High Waist C-Section Recovery & Slimming Panty
description:
The C-Section Recovery & Slimming Panty
 
The only product you will need after c-section - The C-Panty High Waist panty is a complete recovery solution - no more scar creams, hospital panties, belly wraps or binders. C-Panty helps speed recovery and reduces scarring with its patented medical grade silicone panel inside the panty and customized compression to slim the post baby belly.
 
Heal faster - Patented interior silicone panel gives you professional incision care to minimize scarring and helps protect the delicate incision area.  It also reduces itchiness, redness and restores skin to more natural texture.
 
Care for baby in comfort - Gentle compression supports weakened muscles and makes moving around after surgery easier and more comfortable.  Convenient, pull on and go recovery panty for maximum comfort.   
 
Slim down and shape up - C-Panty supports and slims even after you've recovered. It also helps flatten the c-section shelf under clothing.  Just pull on and go until you are back to your pre-baby self!
  
Designed exclusively for c-sections and #1 recommended by OB/GYN's to speed recovery and reduce the appearance of your scar.
 
Features:
-Compression to speed healing and slim post partum tummy
-Built in medical grade silicone panel over the c-section incision area helps protect incision and promotes healing
-Medical grade silicone is the only material FDA recognized for scar care and Doctor recommended
-Reduces swelling, scarring, sensitivity, tenderness
-Non-binding, fluted waist eliminates the discomfort of elastic waistbands
-Can be worn immediately after delivery

Fabric content: 92% nylon, 8% spandex. Machine washable delicate, line dry. Made in USA.

*READ PACKAGE INSTRUCTIONS. LIKE ANY POST-OP CARE, GRADUAL USE MAY BE REQUIRED TO INCREASE TOLERATION.

Heal faster - Patented interior silicone panel gives you professional incision care to minimize scarring and helps protect the delicate incision area.  Silicone panel also helps to reduce itchiness, redness and restores skin to a more natural texture. 
 
Care for baby in comfort - Gentle compression supports weakened muscles and makes moving around after surgery easier and more comfortable.  Convenient, pull on and go recovery panty for maximum comfort.
 
Look better in your clothes - Compression helps flatten and smooth c-section bulge so scar is less noticeable under clothing. 
 
Designed exclusively for c-sections and recommended by OB/GYN's to speed recovery and reduce the appearance of your scar.

Features:
